title: LIANA AT THE RAFFLES HOTEL GIFT SHOP WAS OUTSTANDING! HIGH KUDOS AND THANK YOU FROM A GRATEFUL OVERSEAS SINGAPOREAN
desc: Aloha from Hawaii! This review has been a long time coming and high kudos to Liana at the Raffles Hotel Gift Shop from a grateful shopper. Liana had the most professional demeanor and helped me acquire over 15 Raffles Polo Shirts, T-Shirts, and more iconic logo accessories for gifting this Christmas here in Hawaii. Liana's exceptional service was evident from the outset when I first asked her for assistance. She made wonderful suggestions and made my shopping experience seamless! Her packing for brilliant too! As a returning overseas Singaporean living in Honolulu, Hawaii, I obviously overbought but was extremely delighted with my purchases. I ended up with my multiple large shopping bags of goodies, and was well satisfied, thanks to Liana. As I made my way to the cab

title: Unobtrusive luxury
desc: For a city break, this comes top as my most relaxing - it's a real oasis in what can be quite a chaotic city! The butlers attending our suite were exceptional - nothing was too much trouble and our room was beautifully attended to whilst we were out, without having to ask for a thing. The staff are exceptional at their jobs - professional, yet friendly and unobtrusive. The rooftop pool is wonderful and has the most spectacular views. It really does feel like you have escaped the city, yet it is all there for you to enjoy.

title: A place for everyone
desc: Raffles Hotel definitely is a place for everyone, offering- repose to the weary traveller, regal charm & colonial splendour to the architect, rich history to the historian. & for the discerning traveller- the amalgamation of modernity with timelessness, in every aspect of these words. More cannot be raved about Mr. Westbeld’s leadership & management of this hotel, the diligent force behind such graceful rhythms.

title: Staff and Service made us feel at home; Beautiful and Classy Interiors
desc: Thank you so much to the Raffles Singapore team for making my birthday stay a beautiful and absolutely special one. From the moment Vanessa escorted us to our suite and said, "Welcome home" to our fantastic team of butlers to the really sweet poolside team and super-attentive Ludeth from the Tiffin Room, I could not have asked for a better way for my family and me to celebrate my 24th. Each of you made Raffles Singapore our home, and pulled all the stops to make us feel extra valued. For a huge hotel chain and a super luxurious one, I am beyond impressed with how Raffles honours the charm of Singapore through their genuine and authentic staff. My family and I have stayed at hotels all across the world and Raffles tops our experience, Raffles doesn't feel like another hotel.

title: Best hotel stay ever
desc: We were well looked after by Grace and the front office team. It was our 10 year wedding anniversary and we wanted to have a special stay in the promenade suite to celebrate. Transfer to the hotel in RR Cullinan and flowers from the head butler when we arrived was a great start. 5 hour spa experience was wonderful. Degustation and wine/sake pairing at butchers block was fantastic. Best hotel stay we have ever had.

title: A vintage treat in the midst of the little red dot!
desc: We stayed for 2 nights at the Raffles hotel and experienced one of the most luxurious vintage-style venue ever. Right from the seamless check-in to the amazing surprises we received in the room for my partner's 40th birthday to the digital check-out, everything about Raffles was astonishing and rewarding. This is one staycation I would wholeheartedly recommend to friends & family for a once-in-a-lifetime experience in Singapore :)

title: A fabulous & memorable stay.
desc: From the moment we stepped into the lobby, we were transported into another world. The service from the doorman to the reception staff, the butler, the F&B staff, in the Boutique shop, the historian who conducted the tour -- it was impeccable. There was warmth and sincerity in all of their interactions with us.

title: Amazing stay, love this hotel!
desc: From the moment we arrived we had such wonderful service. The suite was amazing and we enjoyed the food so much! I need to buy the hotel pillows, dreamy. It was a relaxing stay and really felt that we had 'gone away' somewhere else. Really the best hotel in Singapore!

title: Best Hotel in Singapore. Charming, beautiful
desc: Love love love Raffles Hotel! Beautiful, bright, clean, gorgeous colonial style building. Excellent service staff who will address you by name. Delicious food of the highest quality. Highly recommended for this once in a lifetime stay!

title: A Stay of Indulgence
desc: My husband and I had an absolute great time in Raffles Hotel! We managed to spend all 3 days without leaving the compound simply by enjoying all the rich history the hotel embodies, wonderfully personalized service with the butler, and delectable cuisines the restaurants offer. And the Singapore Sling definitely tastes better here! Now I truly understand why there so many returning residents. A definite great getaway without leaving the country!

title: A hotel that feels like home
desc: A suite feels like a new-found home and the service is excellent. The staff is very friendly and keen to share the history and culture of the hotel. I recommend the history tour to get immerse with the history of the hotel. This is more than just a stay, it is an experience. Definitely will return.

title: Private sanctuary
desc: It was my first time at raffles hotel and it was for my birthday celebration with friends. It was a little overwhelming at first as I was alone and 2 staff attended to me immediately. I think one of your staff mentioned a photograph to be taken but I mentioned that my friend was only joining me later, which I think this part was left out totally thereafter. As this was my first time at raffles, I wasn't sure what exactly was the purpose of the photograph at the start and if I should have follow up with someone. The initial room was without a four poster bed and I gave a feedback that my assumption was that the room came with a four poster bed and didn’t realise that not all room comes with one and I should have requested for it. Staff was very kind to help me check and gave

title: A Tradition - Had to be done!!
desc: Having Heard all about the famous Raffles hotel before we arrived, a visit was always planned. Even the renovations couldn't keep us away!! Lovely old world bar with Peanut shells covering the floor... another tradition.. and with open bags of shelled peanuts on every table you can keep up the tradition. Singapore Slings of course were on the most wanted list and went down a treat. At $31 each they were a little pricey, but a must try all the same. Delighted we got there and ticked another must do off our list. We will return but maybe not again on this trip....

title: Beautiful Grand Old Dame
desc: I spent 3 nights there. The State Room Suite is nice and comfortable, with a decent sized bathroom. Check in was done prior online, so we were taken to the room almost immediately by the concierge after we arrived. They allowed early check in and late check out, so that was nice. The rooftop pool was lovely for relaxing, and the hotel grounds are lovely for a stroll. The history tour was excellent, and Roslee did a great job of showing us the hotel and its displays. However, some lapses in service and procedures were disappointing. A few times, my orders for breakfast were wrong. My bookings were made under 2 reservations, which I requested to be linked. This was fine, except that the charges for the initial nights were not available for checking on the day of check out. There

title: Great staycation, can't wait to come back!
desc: Great staycation experience from start till end...the staff were all very friendly & hospitable. The service standards were top-notch, whether it was housekeeping, butlers, doorman, valets, bellboys, waitstaff etc, everyone was warm and welcoming. Would like to give special mention to Harpreet the doorman who was so cheerful & went out of his way to help us get some nice photos outside the hotel entrance. His personal touch & willingness to engage in conversation definitely added to the memorable experience. It was my most enjoyable hotel stay till date, and definitely looking to come back again!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Pretty impressive and they even prepared a little cake for my daughter when i told them that we are celebrating her birthday on the first day of the stay. the check-in was a breeze as it was done in the room and for the check-out, you just need to leave the keys in the room and leave.

title: A great family birthday celebration staycation at Raffles
desc: We had such a lovely time at Raffles, a family of four with two children aged 10 & 12. We stayed in a Personality Suite which was huge and had everything we needed. The most impressive thing was the service, great staff who made sure we were having a good time, particularly at the high tea to celebrate my daughter's birthday. It was a truly memorable stay and the best we have had in Singapore.

title: Memorable staycation
desc: A staycation treat for me and one that I will remember for a long time. Suite was spacious and very well equipped - the bed was to die for and I slept as well as i ever done so in it. Service was faultless at all times. Highly recommend the history tour - was fascinating to hear about the hotel through the years from the expert . Would love to return. Thank you to all the staff for making my final “hurrah” in Singapore such a memorable event.

title: Best Ever Staycation
desc: Service was superb! Frontdesk staff — Fazzirah— escorted us to the suite to process the check-in. She was very friendly and thoughtful. Followed by a pair of butler who came to explained the features in the suite. Although there was technical glitch to the ipads controlling the ambience settings, it was resolved quickly by the engineers. The Courtyard Suite was spacious with elegant Victorian taste in design. The newly renovated hotel elevated the entire ambience with 1x ipad to control the bedroom settings and 1x ipad to control the patio settings incl. the respective tv controls. U can stream Netflix too! Clean sheets and pillow are an absolute for me! There were selections of Tempur pillow. Love the size of the pool and gym! The hotel is also a mini museum itself, with

title: Staycation
desc: Had a staycation here at Raffles Hotel for two nights after my wedding. My husband and I had such a good experience. The suite is huge and well equipped! We were also very impressed by the impeccable service from the hotel staffs. Thank you for making our stay an enjoyable one, we will be back again!

title: Fantastic service with amazing facilities!
desc: Throughly enjoyed the breakfast with wide selection, fantastic deep pool (1.5m) with drinking water easily accessible after a swim, the fantastic butler service and high tech suite with everything controlled using an iPad. You can even order pillows on the iPad (tempur pillows). What even?! My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed the Royal Thali set for in-suite dining services and above all, special thanks to Raoul who was so gracious and warmth in his service during breakfast that really made the whole stay worthwhile. Really recommend this place!

title: The Best Staycation in Singapore so far...
desc: Wow! I am truly amazed by the service and details that the staff have taken to make my stay at the raffles a memorable one! One of the staff, Amir, made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay by ensuring all reservations for meals, bags etc were taken care of. Rooms were lavishly decorated and the bed is extremely comfortable. Walls are also sound proof. The resident historian, Roslee, was also very passionate in bringing us for a tour of the hotel. It feels like a step back in colonial Singapore at times. I highly recommend the Raffles hotel . The only thing is that the price is very steep and I can only come if there are promotions from the Hotel or from travel websites like Klook (which I got a very good deal from). You can watch the video tour & review on my YouTube

title: Perfect Staycation
desc: Family needed a little getaway to relax and unwind and Raffles was definitely the place! The room was beautiful and staff are friendly. The kids enjoyed themselves which was a win for the husband and I.

title: Always perfect!
desc: I have written a review for this property early this year but I am adding another review of my most recent stay last week. I stayed for 5 nights and I celebrated my birthday during my stay. Grace & the butler team are the best!!! Service from the heart, not because it is an obligation to their job. They are attentive to details and remember all my preferences. They prepared a wonderful birthday surprise for me and made my birthday extra special! Everything is perfect as always. If there is something that can be improved on... it will be the breakfast at the Tiffin Room. The menu is scaled down from my first few stays in 2020 and early 2021, with a few of my favourite dishes removed from the list. There is also no new additions or daily specials and the menu is very limited.

title: Enjoyed our staycation
desc: My family and I really enjoyed our 2 night stay at the Raffles Hotel. The rooms were luxurious and we wanted to spend as much time in there as possible. A lot of thought went into the amenities that were provided. The antique box finish console which had the coffee maker/kettle/mini bar/etc was just classic and added to the beauty of the room. The bathroom was massive and contained everything we needed.

title: Perfect Staycation Ever!
desc: If you are looking for one of a kind luxurious hotel staycation, Raffles Hotel is the place. The accommodation, amenities, ambience, and food are excellent. What makes our stay extraordinary are the superb staff hospitality of Sadiq, Raoul, Roslee, doormen, and chauffeurs. The experience was indeed splendid. Sadiq has consistently made sure that me and my husband are comfortable and happy - before arrival, during our stay, and until our departure from hotel. He is really a gem in Raffles Hotel. Our stay really rejuvenated our body and mind. A great getaway!

title: Amazing stay!
desc: We have just spent the most fabulous 2 days at your premises. I wanted to congratulate everyone for the flawless amazing service, way above our expectations. In addition to being a 5 star hotel, you have managed to make us feel welcome and special. We enjoyed the Spa, Dame de Pic, the welcome Singapore Sling, BBR and 2 incredible breakfasts. We felt very special when Monsieur Serol would take some of his busy time to talk to us on various occasions. We also had the honour of meeting Mr Leslie Danker the Resident Historian! Special thanks to Mr Albert (or Robert), who was watering the orchids in the lobby and kindly chatted with us. Our final meal was at Osteria BBR which not surprisingly was also delicious. We were introduced to Rodolfo the bar man who marvelled us with his

title: Exceeds expectation in all counts!
desc: My wife and I were celebrating our wedding anniversary. Upon check in, we were pleased to note that there was an upgrade provided to us to the Ava Gardner Suite Room, when we visited the room there a complementary cake for us. At each point, during our stay the service was spectacular, highly recommend everyone to sign up for the History Tour which was both educational and insightful, also the food was superb, breakfast dishes were all cook to order, highly recommend the various asian selections. I had dinner at the Alain Ducasse Osteria BBR, the food left me and my wife floored and the service was spectacular. We made no mention that it was our anniversary and yet they knew it and gave us a complementary dessert. We will be back.

title: Be pampered in this heritage hotel
desc: Be pampered in this heritage hotel that offers excellent butler service and cosy suites for a relaxing stay in spite of its central location in the city. You will be spoilt with the number of F&B options in and around the hotel. Check out the boutiques in their shopping arcade and find time to join a guided tour to know more about the hotel’s history, restoration and famous guests. Enjoy breakfast in the private space of your balcony in a bigger suite which is good for families and friends. Perfect for a staycation for special occasions and celebrations!

title: Definitely a class of its own
desc: It has been an extremely pleasant stay at Raffles. The welcome reception and service rendered to us is impeccable. Our needs are constantly seen to by the butler service which has been by far very impressive. We have nothing but praises for this wonderful experience we have had during our stay. Looking forward to coming back again.

title: Another Enjoyable stay and Service Excellence!
desc: Excellent service provided by the Raffles team! They are warm, helpful and friendly too, the team make an effort to remember their guest names, this is one of 5he thing that impressed me too. Rooms and amenities are clean, very pleasant and comfortable stay! Thumbs up!!

title: Great staycay to start off the Festive Season
desc: I decided to kick-off the festive season with a return to the Grand Dame. It started off a little bumpy with some few unsatisfactory hygiene details but team was very quick to rectify these - since I've stayed at The Raffles for many times already, I knew it was not the standard. Lobby team was very apologetic and went over and beyond ensuring that I was satisfied with my stay during the next couple days. Amelia was amazing! As always, the suite was up to par, with some pleasant surprises such as the new glasses replacing those that were very difficult to grip in my previous stays. There needs to be some tweaking though with the iPad Control System - the DND button wasn't functioning at all, I had to use the one in the toilet to activate it. The thing that sets Raffles apart

title: Centrally located and excellent Service
desc: Had a 2-night staycation recently at Raffles Hotel. Was celebrating my wife's bday and was heartened by the hotel's efforts to make my wife's day special. Service generally is at a higher level than most upmarket local hotels we have stayed in. Will surely come back again.

title: Definitely a good stay
desc: An awesome stay with great location and room amenities. It is a true experience of home. Once, you enter the hotel for check-in, it's "Welcome Home". The check-in service at the suite itself is an added value. The butler explanation on facilities is commendable. Very quiet and serene stay.

title: Wonderful Raffles - Outstanding in every way!
desc: Raffles Singapore is truly a very wonderful and special experience and one we won't forget. The service is exceptional, the rooms, amenities etc are pure luxury. The breakfasts are lavish and served by a wonderful team. The hotel has a great third floor pool and bar and offers a great space to enjoy the sunshine. We have a long list of people to thank for making our 5-day stay magnificent in every way. In particular thanks to Sonny (Butler service), Gibson (breakfast) , Christine (Courtyard bar) , Nazir (Front office) and Yujan (Reception) you made this place even more special for us. We look forward to returning soon! Kevin and Richard

title: Excellent and memorable return staycation!
desc: The staff are excellent and had provided superb services during our stay. I felt welcomed and valued, the staff make an effort to remember their guest names and this really impressed me. The room, amenities are very clean, is very comfortable to stay in this hotel. My point of view is that you could hardly find such a good service in Singapore! I look forward to my upcoming staycation again soon. Two thumbs up!!

title: Perfect Birthday Celebration for my Hubby
desc: I celebrated my hubby’s birthday in Raffles Hotel. Throughout our staycation, most of the staff are able to address and greet us correctly. I love how the staff portrayed their great attention to addressing our needs, from check-in, during our stay and until check-out. We spent most of our time in the hotel even though Raffles Hotel is located just beside Raffles City (we did not even head there for shopping). The gym and swimming pool are fabulous! Booking of slots are simple and easy. We did all the pre-bookings weeks before we check-in, although some of the reservations were reported missing. But no worries, the Guest services and butler team are very responsive to help us with any matters. The Stateroom suite has been very well renovated and has incorporated the

title: Great Staycation
desc: Was a wonderful stay. The Team Raffles are great at making sure you have a great holiday! The room & facilities are great. While pool & gym are small, they are well equipped and fantastic. Restaurants are great. There are several. Would call out Osteria for the food & service.

title: Great stay!
desc: Fantastic services and had a great stay which was seamless. The butlers were attentive and address any minor issues very promptly. The hotel and room was very clean. The check in process was fine and loved the iconic welcome drink!

title: Cozy and classical stay
desc: Very classical place, good location, MRT just 5 minutes walk away. Shopping mall also next to it. Easy to access to anywhere in Singapore. Friendly staffs, nice winter’s bar , breakfast very good and of course must try Singapore sling here!

title: An unforgettable family vacation at Raffles Hotel
desc: As part of an extended family vacation in Singapore we had the pleasure of spending 9 nights at Raffles - 5 booked into the stateroom and 4 in the palm court suite. Overall, this was prob. the best hotel stay we have ever had the pleasure of enjoying. Every interaction with the hotel staff was top notch and it truly felt like a home away from home. We had initially planned to only spend five night at Raffles but decided to return to the hotel and extend our stay after a disappointing experience at another Singapore property. We really would like to thank the entire staff at Raffles for providing such outstanding service. Be it the greeters welcoming you home, the butlers who could not be more present, the excellent staff handling guest stays as well as the F&B staff. It would

title: An Iconic Hotel
desc: Whilst in Singapore we had to stay at the world famous Raffles! The renovations are fresh, the rooms perfect. Some aspects of the main building don't quite fit and the weird 'Mardi Gras display a little underwhelming. Whilst all of the staff are friendly and attentive my overall perception doesn't bring me to a 'world class' hotel. I was expecting to see crisp professional impeccably presented staff interacting like finely tuned cogs, as I've experienced in less well known hotels. Our visit to Osteria, we chose the tasting menu, delivered on every front, I would highly recommend you try. Overall breakfast was good, pastries exceptional waffles good, pancakes and french toast lacking and i believe your maple syrup is mixed with syrup. The salmon and meats I felt could be

title: Excellent in Every Way!
desc: Raffles Hotel Singapore truly lives up to its reputation. From the days leading up to our stay, they were always in touch with us to ensure that everything was all taken care of. During our actual stay, not only was an early check-in extended to us, but we were upgraded to a lovely personality suite! Our stay was made more complete with an exquisite dining experience at Yi by Jeremy Leung, and a lovely spa experience as well. Overall a splendid stay!

title: Amazing experience
desc: Amazing experience while staying in Raffles hitel. The staff were so professional and the rooms were beautiful. The service was what stood out and it is world class. Everyone was so friendly and accomodating and it made the experience all the more worthwhile.

title: Absolutely amazing and Harpreet, the valet was so courteous and friendly.
desc: We went to the Tiffin Room recently and when booking our cab, our driver went AWOL. Harpreet, the valet at the entrance was patiently waiting with us and quickly booked us a cab immediately! And this was when it was such a busy time for him! These little things go such a long way in making experiences great!

title: Refresh and Rejuvenate
desc: A tick in bucket list that can't wait to repeat. We always want to stay at Raffle Hotel. It has been in our bucket list for over 20 years. With the thought of before we leave Singapore, we will have to stay at Raffles Hotel. Well, we are pleased that we stayed and we are still living in Singapore so we can revisit. Raffles Hotel always has its magic every time we visited. Frankly, in 20 years...the magic was faded. We even thought to change our bucket list at one point. The new overhaul renovation just bring back it's magic to the top. We love every minutes once we stepped out of the car at the front lobby. The staffs were amazing and friendly. We didn't know what to think of having butler but it didn't take long to get used to having butler at your service. The

title: Perfect vacation choice
desc: Due to travel restrictions, my wife and I (sometimes with our 3 grown-up kids) are doing staycation almost once a month. We have stayed at hotels such as Fairmont, Hilton, Mandarin Orchard, Grand Hyatt, ParkRoyal Collection Marina Bay, and we chose suite room when it is only 2 of us. This is our first time doing staycation at Raffles Hotel and we were blown away. The price is on the higher tier, but everything is perfect. From the time we reached the entrance, greeted by the iconic Doorman Mr. Narayan (I think that is his name) to the time we did the check-out in our suite, we were impressed. Check-in was done very fast at the front of lobby, but our room was not ready as we reached the hotel at 1pm. When we went to collect our key at check-in time 3pm, we were told by the Duty

title: Fantastic Staycation Experience!
desc: Had always been wanting to stay at Raffles Hotel for the longest time and I certainly was not disappointed with the stay. Decided to booked the Stateroom Suite for a start for my 1st Raffles Journey! The magical experience started the moment I step foot on to the hotel, from the Raffles General to the butlers and the bellboy. I was warmly greeted by butler Anwar who politely ushered me to my suite and explained the various offerings the hotel has to offer. Butler Cheryl arrived shortly to my suite and gave a very thorough orientation of the suite, explaining the various features and the amenities inside the suite. The suite was spaciously huge and decent! It was so well designed that beautiful is an understatement to describe the classy suite. Bed and pillows were so soft

title: A lazy Sunday in the lion city
desc: The team at BBR osteria are fantastic and the setting beautiful. The food was excellent too. Meeting Harpreet at the Beach Road entrance pick up was the icing on the cake. No wonder this gem is an institution! Great people make great places! Thank you team Raffles.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: From the checking in to checking out, everything was excellent. The level of service is superb. Room is very clean, very high tech. Food was excellent. Really enjoyed the stay. Keep up the excellent service!

title: Perfect
desc: Have my solemnisation in Raffles Hotel and it was perfect. Butler is really helpful. Opted for in suite breakfast and it is fantastic. Best breakfast ever had in my life. Would love to stay again. The hotel are very accommodating with our demands.

title: Different league..!
desc: Unparalleled experience - high class service, suite, food, facilities… simply impressive! The suite key is a fine leather card - that sums up the luxury you would expect… Multitude of high standards restaurants catering all tastes… it’s in a different league!

title: Henden
desc: Excellent service and food.Lovely Mercedes S for transfer from Airport to hotel and return to Changi for departure.Very friendly staff including top Managers.Our Courtyard suite on the ground floor had a beautiful parlour/sitting room, bedroom,bathroom,shower room and toilet with a side tap to wash bum which is very hygienic in the toilet section. Gym,pool bar and Spa very nice.We didn't want to swim as we have our own pool at our home. Would definitely stay here at the the same Courtyard suites during all our future visits.

title: Amazing Heritage hotel, probably the most famous hotel in the world
desc: Stayed here at Christmas this year to celebrate our Golden Wedding. The rooms, building and environs are superlative. All facilities in our room were controlled by iPads in bedroom and lounge. The Courtyard suite was really amazing. We stayed here also in 2013, since then there have been some changes but the atmosphere and heritage remains. The staff were very well drilled and delivered their services immaculately. The staff on the Courtyard bar were a little more relaxed and easy to chat to. Swimming pool area was quiet staff there were very welcoming and friendly.

title: "To have been young and had a room at Raffles was life at its best" – James Michener, 1949
desc: Raffles Singapore lives up to its reputation till this day. Such a feat is very much thanks to the gracious hospitality that the staff have strictly upheld constantly. I wish to express my gratitude to the front office team. They have made our most recent stay at Raffles more memorable with their impeccable service from the moment we stepped onto Raffles, aiding with our luggage and ensuring that we were properly taken care even till after we checked out. Special shout out to Roslee, Masri, Kasim and Shobanah. I am glad to have partaken Roslee’s history tour as he continued to amuse me with his vast knowledge, hilarity and wit. The butler team this time was much better. Butlers were observant and obliging. The housekeeping team, persistently the uncelebrated troupe of the

title: Wedding and stay
desc: Good 👍🏻 Experience. Feels like home. Had our wedding and then extended the stays. Breakfast was awesome… staffs and butler are professional and attentive. Special thanks to the hotel teams that look after us and our needs.

title: Never fail to make the stay feel warmth and peaceful.
desc: Always feel welcome and all your needs are always met with the great team at Raffles. The rooms are all soundproof and have full blackout blinds. You can enjoy the peace and tranquillity of the hotel even though is right in the city area.

title: Awesome experience
desc: We have stayed in many hotels in Singapore and Raffles truly stood out from the rest! From the moment we arrived, the warm welcome we received, the service standard was above our expectations and we are so glad we decided to stay at Raffles for our 15th year wedding anniversary. We enjoyed the room and had fun exploring with the Ipad to control the room. It was so clean, beautiful, well-thought, classy, cozy, there really was nothing we did not enjoy and we really really hope to return to Raffles and bring our 3 children along, because the experience was truly a memorable one. The only thing I wished we could have experienced was the historical tour. Unfortunate that we were too late to book our slot. Other than that, we really really LOVE our stay.

title: Every was great right. The service, easy check-in / check-out, the beautiful room, restaurants food etc.
desc: This is the best and most luxury hotel in Singapore which you can enjoy exceptional experience the moment you step into the hotel. The history tour is highly recommended which is complimentary. Roslee who was the historian for my tour was super passionate and humorous which made the entire trip very memorable.

title: Legendary hospitality
desc: We were pleasantly surprised by the anniversary tarts and sweet treats for our kids given to us on our first day the moment we had been briefed . Everyone was friendly and ensured we were comfortable .

title: Best Hotel in Singapore. Keith and Jeremy and their team of great staff took great care of me and family.
desc: The hotel is so peaceful and quiet, room is first class, service was first class and the in-room dining was great. The check-in was in the room and even though it was my 3rd visit in 2021, every visit was very comfortable and a well-rested staycation.

title: Excellent stay & service
desc: It was a wonderful stay. Excellent service though not impeccable. We had some issues booking restaurant reservations & the history tour through the phone as the calls get dropped for the 2 times I called in after the staff tried to connect us to the relevant department. I think it is best if you can make reservations through email earlier as the restaurants were already fully booked by the time we checked in. Despite all that, the hotel did manage to book us a history tour on the day we checked out with Mr Roslee, who was extremely knowledgeable about the hotel. The butlers were prompt attending to our requests and their service is excellent. The valet driver was also very friendly and helpful. All the staff made us feel very welcomed. The hotel room was modern as it was

title: Perfect stay
desc: The staff were friendly, helpful and thoughtful. Service was excellent and I felt like a royalty staying there. Room is spacious and clean. Online check-in and check-out in our room instead of queuing.

title: Welcome Home
desc: While having a bit of a reputation as a serial staycationer, I've not experienced such level of hospitality as it was from Raffles ever (ok one or two come close). Raffles Butlers were always attentive and never out of reach when I requested for items. Every need I had was met with promptness. Some guests I had over, none could stop complimenting the grace and elegance with which the room was set up. I thought it captured the old world charm perfectly, while balancing tech needs the first world is accustomed today. Beautiful touches of orange leather within resined cabinets also created another balance of luxury with antiquity. And I must not forget, the room was capacious, and one might probably notice that it is accentuated by the 3-4m high ceilings. And everything was spick

title: Delighted stay
desc: This is my 2nd stay within a year .I am thankful to Mr Keith Chong's personal attention. He coordinated my arrival to departure. My family and I are delighted with the personal touches by Mr Keith Chong and his colleagues.

title: Sensational
desc: As always, our recent stay was completely up to expectations. The rooms are second to none, the personal butler service from the check in to the check out is simply exceptional, the relaxed vibe of the place, the old world feel matched with the modern amenities is simply a differentiator to most other hotels. The choice of food and beverage throughout the hotel is just brilliant and a compete treat at every turn. The staff are helpful, proactive, engaging and attentive and simply could not fault a single thing on this visit, even constructively. It was a pleasure to be there and was totally relaxing for the whole family.

title: The best hotel in Singapore
desc: This is my second time staying in the hotel. Everything is perfect; every single staff, the beautiful furnished and smart home feature room, the iconic buildings, the lovely gardens, the delicious food…. It’s also very nice to have chance to meet the hotel resident historian Mr Leslie Danker and get to know some interesting stories about the hotel! Hope to see you next time Mr Danker, and I will bring your book and ask for your signature 😁

title: The perfect return to travel
desc: What an experience! As soon as I cleared immigration, the driver was escorting me to the car and I was escorted to my suite where the check in process was done and dusted within a minute. The room itself was stunning, with a great iPad to control every aspect of the room. The room was beautifully appointed with a large parlour and amazing bedroom and bathroom. I frequented the pool where CK was attentive and made some great food and drink recommendations. The Tiffin Room at breakfast was simply perfect, with a wide ranging menu to cater for all tastes. Nicholas and Konstantine in The Writers Bar were so lovely to chat to and the drinks were some of the best I have ever had. Of course I had to visit The Long Bar for a Singapore Sling and again a fantastic afternoon of

title: The Raffles experience, simply the best you can find.
desc: The Raffles Hotel is undoubtedly an amazingly beautiful old style property rich in history. But the experience from the service of the staff, the food and facilities brings the whole experience to a new level. I have stayed in many luxury hotels around the world, and in my opinion, Raffles is the best of the best.

title: Good, cosy and comfortable stay!
desc: The overall experience was excellent. The service provided was professional and most important it was warm and sincere, not politically right, official or because it is job requirement because it was a 5 star hotel.

title: Excellent Ambience!
desc: The hotel is beautiful, rooms are gorgeous, and well furnished. Can't compliment the room, toilets and grounds enough. Had two queen beds which was very spacious. Toilets were huge. The grounds were also very beautiful and tranquil. The service is also impeccable. Thank you for the call the day before to confirm the details and to tell us what to expect. The history tour was also enlightening. Finally, thank you for providing a cake to celebrate my husband's birthday!

title: Amazing staycation. Raffles Hotel really lives up to its reputation
desc: Considering how much more expensive Raffles is than all other 5-star hotels I've been to, I would not have booked a stay if my wife had not expressed keen interest. It didn't take long from the time we walked in, however, for all my doubts to melt away. All the small touches in the architecture and décor radiated uncommon elegance and comfort. The service made us feel like royalty and everything from the check in/out system to the butler network felt special in an understated, natural way. The Raffles History Tour was fascinating and enjoyable. We have no doubt that Mr Nazir made all the difference. His measured delivery of the stories of the past was urbane and captivating and kept us attentive of his every word. Our room was perfect. We particularly loved the verandah, the

title: Well located and restful stay
desc: The experience is exquisite. We are grateful to your wonderful team who are commited and passionate about service. Our special compliments to Ms Son Jiyeon who is always eager to ensure our stay is comfortable and memorable. Also Ms. Emelyne at the breakfast restuarant - she is impeccable in her service. We also want to thank a Filipino Chinese lady in housekeeping (sorry I did not get her name) who is very customer centric, cheerful and wonderful. Ms Shuxian - very pleasant and amazing, helping us to take pictures. Also Ms Amelia from the Lobby team who is warm, helful and takes excellent pictures. It is a truly a remarkable stay.

title: Homely stay with tranquility in the heart of the city
desc: We have seen documentary and heard words of mouth of the Raffles experience for years but never had a chance to stay before COVID-19. This was in fact the first time we decided to have a 2-night stay to check out the legend. Our 2-night stay indeed proved that the hotel has lived up to the high expectation we had right from check-in to check-out. The hotel was running full capacity on both days, but the Grand Lobby did not even give a single hint about that unlike many luxury properties around the bay area. We stayed at the Palm Court Suite, overlooking a magnificent garden sitting right next to a busy road but we could hardly notice the chaos on the other side of the fence. The newly renovated (2019) suite brought us back to the early glorious days of the hotel in harmony with

title: Excellet stay
desc: Best of best hotel Beat my expectation in all corners Hope we can visit regularly if price not bounce too high to afford My young children really enjoy and willing to practice good manner under the influence of kind staff

title: Great Service, Great Comfort
desc: A most enjoyable stay for 3 nights. It was quiet, peaceful, service was impeccable. Everyone was attentive. The room was clean, i especially liked the option to choose my pillow. The Butler service was prompt and efficient. The ipad in the room controls the temperature and lightings in the room very well.

title: Extraordinary location and Excellent Service fit for a Royal Family
desc: Property size visually looks like colonial home spread out across the property There are 3 floors Lobby was huge with a skyline roof maintaining its old wooded structure and a majestic chandelier exuding a glow of beauty You will see the great grand old dame clock at the entrance Parking is available Infront of the hotel or basement. You need to collect a carpark voucher to enjoy free parking from the valet Restaurants & bars had delicious food but you are required to make reservations to avoid disappointment Pool, gym, spa - we actually book a time slot for the use of facilities. We were brought round the gym, spa and pool area . There is also a pool side café that serves delicious light bites and refreshments Hotel Tour- we book a tour of the hotel and we were greeted by

title: Memorable Stay
desc: We enjoyed the hospitality, culture, peace and serenity of the hotel and its facilities. The iconic property does not rest on its laurels of the past but continues to reinvent itself. It is literally a walk through history.

title: Truly Amazing
desc: They do everything brilliantly even the little things. Butler service is amazing, they go the extra yard to help. Location is awesome, $8 taxi ride to all of the Quays. Hotel renovation is amazing. $200 Mil well spent. Choice of restaurants is exceptional

title: Good stay, well located, excellent service. Good value for money as I booked the room at a very special rate.
desc: I received VIP right from the start - from the Asst Dir of Sales, Front Office check-in, butler service, tiffin room service, right down to housekeeping, I was very happy with the service and room and it would have been perfect if not for the mattresses - they were way too hard.

title: Amazing Raffles
desc: Raffles Hotel in Singapore has a long-standing reputation of being one of the world’s most iconic and storied hotels. And its ranking amongst the world’s best has only been enhanced by recent multi-million-dollar restorations. Previously we’d only visited Raffles for a Singapore Sling in the historic Long Bar or to browse the boutique shopping gallery, so when our first overseas trip for 2 years came around, we were beyond excited to be staying at this heritage property. We made the Raffles reservation on a whim in early 2021 after picking up business class award seats (thankyou Qantas) to Singapore in January 2022. I’ve lost count of how many flights and hotels I’ve cancelled because of covid, so we didn’t really think this trip would go ahead (always book with free

title: Surpassing expectations
desc: Currently here at the hotel for a short stay. From the moment we arrived at Changi airport and were met and escorted to our (very comfortable) car we have experienced tremendous service. The hotel itself is absolutely breathtaking in its design, architecture and decoration. We had previously visited pre-restoration and can say that the essence of the hotel has not changed but has been brought up to date by the addition of technology and sympathetic restoration. The suite we have is spacious and equipped well with all amenities. The furnishings are exceptional from the furniture in the parlour, the spacious and very comfortable bed to the roll top bath in the double vanity bathroom. Today we were treated to the History of Raffles tour by Mr. Roslee, who not only was extremely

title: Impeccable service from hotel and events team!
desc: Held my wedding at Raffles Hotel. Gave my wife, my family, and guests a memorable evening. Jeremy from Events Team took care of the entire ceremony, and we couldn't have expected more. The end-to-end pre-wedding planning to Post-Wedding were all executed with impeccable service. Kudos and thanks to Raffles Hotel, Jeremy and his team! -JAM

title: An Icon is Back?
desc: Having watched the documentary on the remaking of the Raffles, we were looking forward to our stay with great anticipation - and we were not disappointed. Our compliments to all the staff, management, architects, interior designers and builders on a magnificent job done on the hotel. We cannot fault the staff of the hotel who interacted with us from the famed Raffles doormen, valet, wait staff, butlers to housekeeping. However, we found the famed Raffles Butler Service wanting on a number of occasions and were very disappointed with that. To us that was the low point of our short stay.

title: Spectacular hotel
desc: We stayed in the Palm Court Suites with our two daughters for the weekend and came away blown away with the interior, decor and service. There were a few faults in the room for example slow draining bath, the safe was out of battery so couldn't use it and switch for the coffee/kettle not turned on at main switch behind the drinks cabinet. This was all resolved by the butler and we were sent some complimentary coffee to take away with us. We enjoyed breakfast and room service there. Every item has been carefully selected and delicious. We were able to enjoy our time slots at the pool after breakfast and staff there very friendly. We ended the staycation with a history tour of the hotel with Roslee Sukar, who really made this stay memorable. I have two daughters ages 8&5 who

title: The Most Incredible Experience
desc: My wife and I celebrated her special birthday at Raffles Hotel last week, and every detail was handled perfectly, the customer service was outstanding (best I have ever seen!), and the entire weekend was absolutely amazing. Words cannot describe how special my wife, myself, and every other guest we interacted with, felt during our visit - truly a remarkable experience.

title: Fabulous from start to finish
desc: We visited Singapore for my mum's 80th birthday and from being met by Vanessa at reception and taken to our suites through to Sunny, Thyra and Amanda our ever friendly butlers we had a fantastic experience. Visiting Tiffin for breakfast and dinner the 'energiser' Gibson was awesome as was the very pleasant Lethodo. Al fresco breakfast was superb. Harpreet on the door is a welcome at morning or early evening. Had pleasure of meeting Nicholas and Raoul on their early evening rounds then drinks in the Writers Bar. I'm sure you are aware but would like to state what great ambassadors your Team are for Raffles. PS Couldn't forget the unforgettable Marvin who look after mum in particular !!

title: Service Par Excellence
desc: I have travelled to many parts of the world and stayed at some of the best hotels. This is my first time at the Raffles and my expectations are very high. Congratulations Raffles Hotel, you have exceeded them! The Old World charm is there, the buildings, the wide verandahs, the perfectly manicured lawns merging seamlessly into the New World comfort and conveniences. And above all the impeccable service - that is the Jewel in the Crown. Not once have I encountered a "No", every problem or issue could be resolved by the staff, from the manager to the butler to the porters and doormen. I will be back!

title: Sumptuous
desc: Everything I thought it would be and more. The lobby was breathtaking and the hotel luxurious but the most notable thing was the personal touch from all members of staff - everyone greeted me by name and the impression was one of a more intimate and personal service than that of a large, impersonal, corporate hotel

title: Luxury Personified
desc: The minute we got to Raffles, we were welcomed and well taken care of, seamless checkin, amazing staff and the service was exceptional. Nothing was too much trouble, I only had to ask once. The hotel is exquisite, the rooms are amazing. It was a very beautiful memorable stay.

title: Best Hotel
desc: Top notch service from a true 5-star+ hotel. The staff from the minute you step out of the car and are greeted by the doormen, it’s as if you’re at home. The service is exceptional as if they read your mind. They know exactly your preferences for Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, and cocktails. Very professional and courteous staff always offering a smile. One knows that the staff is passionate about their environment and workplace and it spills over in their treatment of the guests. The staff want to be there, they’re not there to simply collect a paycheque. The staff is an envy to any industry, or company. It is very difficult to find staff as committed and passionate about their work.

title: Professional services taking care of every details.
desc: I had a wedding banquet and stay station in the famous Raffles Hotel in Singapore which gave me good experience as every details are taken care off. The high quality services that I received justified the price that I paid

title: Absolute great experience - highly recommend!
desc: We decided to stay at Raffles Singapore for our 21st Anniversary and were extremely pleased with the overall experience, from booking and pre-arrival correspondences until the moment a number of staff waived good-bye. The entire Raffles Singapore Team is very customer-focused and attentive to the guest's individual needs. The suites are beautifully decorated and feature latest technology gadgets. We are looking froward to stay again at this exceptional hotel!

title: Best in Singapore
desc: Having been finally able to enter Singapore we chose the Raffles, having seen that many hotels opened up their doors during the pandemic for “lower budget” stay cay’s, leading to a shift in clientele as well as significant “wear and tear” rather than using the time to refurbish. Glad we did and found a new “home” in Singapore- service, suites, restaurants, gym/pool/spa, all to highest standards and a lovely clientele. The location is spot on and there is nothing the hotel does not try to make happen.

title: A Class Above the Rest
desc: I was like a kid in a candy store when it came to selecting a 5 star hotel in Singapore. Since I couldn't choose where to stay, we decided to go hotel-hopping. We stayed at the spacious Westin, the modern JW Marriott, the Grand Hyatt in the middle of shopping paradise, the swanky St. Regis, the relaxed W Sentosa Resort, and the iconic Raffles Hotel. We enjoyed each of our visit and all of the hotels will be reviewed separately. However, I'm glad we saved the best for last. From the moment we pulled up to the gravelly driveway, we immediately felt welcomed and were made to be at home. Starting from the stately doormen to our graceful butlers to the boutique, everyone treated us with kindness and warmth. It is no wonder that this establishment is a class above the rest. I love

title: Great stay
desc: Overall, a wonderul stay. It's our first time with Raffles. Received a pleasant surprise from the Butler team for our annivesary celebration. Throughout the stay, we were impressed with the service and friendly disposition of every staff from the doormen right to the workers fixing the maintenance outside the suite.

title: Excellent Service !!
desc: Raffles Hotel will never dissappoint me by their service. I have visited the Raffles Hotel for their afternoon tea recently and impressed by their service. Especially Gibson ,if I don't remember his name wrongly, he takes an initiative to offer help on taking some nice photo of me and my friend when we are struggling on it. I can see how busy he is but he notice that we need help and offer his time to us. Good job ,Gibson. The afternoon tea is also worth to try and looking forward to my next visit again.

title: High expectations were exceeded.
desc: Overnight family staycation with 2 toddlers. Perfect experience from check-in, amenities, discreet and discerning staff, down to the perfect grouting for the bathroom tiles. In room digital valet was amazing. I'm going to do the same for my remodeled home. This stay far exceeded my expectations, and I'm comparing this with previous Small hotels of the World (Capella, Datai etc). Look forward to my next stay.

title: Disappointing
desc: I stayed at the hotel with my wife for a surprise birthday staycation during the pandemic (mid-March 2021). Sadly it didn't meet expectations for multiple reasons listed below: 1. Member of staff showing us to room (Max) took us through the room's iPad, as it is apparently the one-stop-shop for requesting anything during your stay. Unfortunately, he also showed the billed amount - not exactly very classy when you're staying at a 5-star hotel and want the financials kept discreet. 2. Upon check-in, the staff requested the ID of my wife despite me having uploaded her passport online days prior. I was told that the image was blurry (a complaint I've never had before given that we use the same PDF all the time), but why did no-one contact me about this before arrival even if it was

title: Staff really go that extra mile !
desc: It was our 25th wedding anniversary and we wanted to revisit a hotel that had wowed us many years ago. Raffles is not just iconic but gives you that unique luxury experience. The warmest of welcomes by Ang Qing who reserved our Covid test to be compliant with Singapore law at the time. Our butlers, and I did say butlers were amazing. Nothing was too much (not that we were that demanding) but the service and genuine caring attitude shown by both Ancy and Kimberly were so appreciated. The beautiful pool was a chance to burn off a few calories after a perfectly cooked full English breakfast. One important and personal memory that I wished to create was to play a very short segment of music on a piano. The aim is to play a full song from many different places in the world for my

title: Hotel staff seemed to be all well trained to take great pictures! :)
desc: Was there with some friends for the Sakura high tea at The Grand Lobby. Love the ambience and setting. The high tea set looks pretty and very instagram worthy. I preferred the savory snacks which tasted really good as compared to the sweet selections, I find them a tad too sweet for my liking. Perhaps more raspberry options to the pink theme would be good to even out the sweets, personal preference as I don't really have a sweet tooth and the taste of the 'pink' snacks seemed pretty similar after a while. If you are going with some friends, would probably be a good idea to order a mix of the traditional high tea and sakura high tea sets for a mix to share. Service was very welcoming starting from the hotel entrance. We somehow felt that the servers were trained well in taking

title: Amazing Experience. From it’s Product to it’s people. Perfection
desc: From the point of pre- checked in, received a call from Anuar to ensure all is in order. Upon arrival greeted by Anuar again and escorted for in room check in. Shortly after Mavis the butler came to give a room tour. Mavis, Elana and Kathy was very warm throughout and it’s them that makes the difference from the other hotel around. Met Elina from Reception to settle payment and Elina made it super smooth. She anticipated what was needed even before I had to ask. She’s definitely a star. Met Bernie,Kane, Paula and Gibson for breakfast and afternoon tea at tiffin and the grand lobby within the same day, this 4 really elevates the entire experience. Look out for them if you dine in. You’ll be in good hands. Shoutout to the hardworking housekeeping team as well that never

title: Suite dreams are made of this
desc: Gosh. I really enjoyed my stay. Quick summary: -- It was a a truly sublime experience. -- The staff are wonderful, caring and attentive. -- The hotel has a calming atmosphere that left me wanting to stay much longer. A good friend of mine, who has stayed a few times recently at Raffles while I was travelling, convinced me to join him for another visit. He had really enjoyed the previous stays and especially the kind, attentive service. So he booked a Palm Court suite through the delightful Lobby Ambassador Ms Jiyeon Son, who had assisted him on the previous two stays. Upon check in, we were delighted to find that we had been upgraded to the Lady Mountbatten suite, which is right at the front of the main building overlooking the Beach Rd entrance. The suite

title: perfect stay
desc: A very personal stay. Staff so accommodating and always smiling. A joy to stay at my favourite hotel in the world. no matter who passed us by we were always called by name. Nothing was ever a bother to anyone

title: Exceptional, Excellent, Extraordinary
desc: My stay experience was definitely one of the best hotel stays I have had. From the porch, to the grand lobby, to the courtyard gardens and suite, everything was just so immaculate and perfect. It is like almost time stood still walking through the hallways and hotel grounds, a juxtaposition to the hustle and bustle of the busy streets just outside the hotel. I stayed at the Elizabeth Taylor Suite (one of 12 personality suites in the property) and it was almost faultless. From the parlour, to the bedroom, dressing room and bathroom, all was nicely polished and flawless. Despite being in a heritage building, I truly appreciate the modernity of the room features. Everything in the room can be controlled by an iPad. Room had high ceilings, and all the lights can be dimmed, which

title: Great location, good stay
desc: Had a restful family staycation at Raffles Hotel during the March holidays. We had a good rest, and the Butler Mr Sunny made the stay very welcoming. However it wasn't without hiccups. To start with, the ceiling rainshower was not working. This was rectified and the shower head was replaced timely. Secondly, there was a menu screen which appeared on the bedroom TV that could only be removed using the TV remote control. As the whole room (lighting, curtains, TV, entertainment prog) was controlled using the iPad only, we had to watch TV with half the screen blocked. While the issue was rectified after giving feedback, and the room service officer came to our room with the TV remote control, the same issue persisted the next day. Thirdly, my husband and I were a bit upset not to

title: The “one” raffles you have to experience
desc: This is arguable one of the best hotel properties around the world, ideal both for business as well as a luxury break. The food, the rooms, the colonial architecture it’s at another level. And the place has a history of its own with the wall of fame.

title: Excellent stay with a perfect location
desc: Our stay at Raffles Singapore was one of our most wonderful experiences. It was truly an excellent stay. From the time that we exited the arrivals at Changi, Raffles met us up, had our limousine airport transfer ready for us, take us to the hotel, it was perfect. The check in with the butler was smooth and easy. The staff was wonderful all over the hotel, so helpful and friendly. The food in the hotel is just wonderful. We had a Palm Court suite which was really nice sized, it was super clean and we had everything that we needed in the room. Everything that you can wish for when you are on holiday with your wife. The Sikh doormen was a pleasure to meet and see, they made us feel som welcome. They and many other in the staff greeted us with, Welcome home! This Grand Dame, iconic

title: Outstanding stay and experience
desc: As a long term resident of Singapore I had yet to stay at the iconic Raffles Hotel. This hotel met all of my expectations and more. The hotel itself is beautiful with comfortable rooms that cater for all needs. What makes it is the staff who can't do enough to help and their service sets it apart from other 5 * hotels in Singapore. One particular highlight was the history tour with the resident historian. Staying at Raffles is more than just your typical hotel stay and I would recommend for the Singapore experience to try this once in a lifetime hotel and soak up the history and culture it has to offer.

title: Outstanding in every way
desc: I am usually very critical and have high expectations. I must say the hotel met all expectations. The service quality is of extremely high standards and I found every part of the hotel to be absolutely sparkling. I will stay here every time I am in Singapore.

title: Great location and Services
desc: Hotel providing Excellent service with professional staff, account managers, the room is very comfortable and clean, room layout is uniquie, very clean, especially the location is convenient to shopping centers and others, I really enjoyed the stay

title: Couples stay at Raffles
desc: The Grande Dame did not disappoint, absolutely breathtaking! Wonderful experience you have to see it to believe it!!!! Do not hesitate to book, from service to food to stunning beauty of the building and grounds the Raffles is an institution of splendor!

title: Beautiful hotel that I didn't want to leave!
desc: raffles is absolutely serenely beautiful. The decor is classic with cool surrounds making the arrival back at the hotel after a day in the heat, a welcome experience. The room we had was perfect in size and facilities and decor. It was good to have so many restaurants on site. The gardens are beautiful.

title: One of the World's Greatest Hotels
desc: An icon in hospitality for the last 135 years and one of the most legendary hotels anywhere in the world, Raffles Singapore oozes elegance at every turn. The hotel underwent a two-year tip to toe renovation between 2017 and 2019, its most comprehensive refurbishment since the late 1980s; and what a refurbishment it was. With interiors by Alexandra Chamalimaud and restoration by Studio Lapis, what once was a slightly faded property is now a sparkling shrine to a bygone era of luxury, with injections of modernity ensuring the property not just competes with but outshines many in its class. Two days before arrival I had been called to check the details of my reservation; this is usually the sign of a good upcoming experience, and this occasion did nothing to change that

title: A taste of the High Life.
desc: Unfortunately did not stay but had Dinner in the Tiffin Room and ate in the Burger and Lobster. Amazing. We were there for our 40th Wedding Anniversary. The food was amazing and the staff were very helpful in explaining the menu and suggested a number of ways to cool the palate. We were given a lovely anniversary cake . The Hotel is amazing and is lovely to walk through. The Long Bar being very popular The courtyard is busy and reservations are essential.

title: Home
desc: Fantastic stay as always. From check in, rooms, housekeeping, everyone is just so well trained and friendly. Made me feel like home as always. Never once disappointed!!! Breakfast was just excellent love the atmosphere. Room service was amazing

title: The Raffles experience
desc: We were welcomed by the staff and shown to our suite. The check in was carried out in our parlour via an ipad. Our butler then showed us how to operate the air con, curtains and lights from the in room ipads - very high tech but convenient. Welcome drinks were provided and any questions about our stay were answered. the suite was perfect, with our balcony overlooking the wonderful gardens. We had made a resevartion for afternoon tea and were very happy with the service and friendly staff, in particular Bernie made us feel at ease. The doorman were always friendly and helpful with directions and local knowledge. Breakfast was to a very high standard and most enjoyable. On one occassion we were lucky enough to meet Mr Leslie danker who has woked at Raffles for 50 years. Leslie is

title: Sublime
desc: Incredible hotel with impressive attention to detail. Afternoon tea was a highlight. The history in this hotel is amazing check out the library and corridor of photos. If you are considering it highly recommend.

title: The best experience ever!
desc: Our stay was exceptional and exceeded all expectations. In fact at times the staff seem to second guess our needs, delighting at every juncture. We aren’t usually hotel food fans but the restaurants here are amazing and we found ourselves eating in for all but one meal. The pool area is well managed and the service impeccable - we enjoyed a lot of time at the poolside, unwinding with a nice cocktail, a great book and a relaxing atmosphere, couldn’t ask for more. Once you’ve stayed at Raffles, I find it hard to imagine us staying anywhere else. We’ve been thoroughly spoilt!

title: It is simply the best
desc: Wonderful stay, you could waffle on for hours but it is fantastic. Everything and everyone is excellent . I have to keep writing as they want 200 characters. Best hotel and service we have ever experienced

title: Great Memories
desc: I had my staycation over an weekends. It's really a crown jewel of his own class. I have a wonderful and unforgettable memories and experience I have during my stay from check-in till check-out. All staff was very polite, helpful and ready to serve attitude. The room was very spacious and the sound proof was really good as once you in your room, you rarely will hear much noises or sound from outside. Lastly, I do love the Mee Goreng on the breakfast list. Do try it when you stay there.

title: Memorable Stay in Palm Court Suite 21st to 23rd April
desc: Check in and Check out procedure is systematic which are very convenient and  easy for guests, Especially the online  registration. Palm Court Suite is wonderful with two queen beds, There has living room, bedroom,  long veranda and big washroom with shower room and bathroom. Our suite facing  main building and garden where you will feel  very refreshing with open air. We’re enjoyed the welcome drinks which are Singapore Sling at raffles courtyard it is very nice. Great Selections for breakfast, especially the Mee Goreng is yummy and we seated at outdoor with nice view. There has a program call History Tour, from the tour we can know better about the story of raffles hotel and view the raffles suite. I would like to thank you Rina, Kathy, Nazir and Cheryl for their great

title: Excellent Stay
desc: We were very impressed with the whole experience. All good things. We were escorted to our rooms and the check in was a breeze. The Butler service was a surprise. Asiq was very attentitive and thoughtful. He surprised us with the cake for my wife's birthday. We were also taking photos and Grace the Rooms Director saw us and offered to take our pictures. She even got one framed sent to our address as we had checked out by then. She was very patient and gracious with us. The rooms were very well done. Really grateful for the small cake and ballons to make my wife's birthday all the more enjoyable A truly mesmerising and delighful experience. Well worth the price. The staff were very polite and made us feel very hospitable.

title: High Society Experience
desc: My first time at the Raffles Main Lobby High Tea and i was rewarded with 5 Star service. From the moment you walk in the front door the majestic adventure begins. The food was first class and the tea selection was delicious. The whole two hours was an experience i could never repeat and the staff made me feel more than special. I recommend anyone coming to Singapore make this a priority to experience as you will not be disappointed. One suggestion is to dress as a minimum Smart Casual as dressing too casual removes from the ambiance and experience Thankyou Raffles

title: Does what it says on the advert
desc: We had a most excellent time at Raffles. Beautiful building, high tea was an exceptional experience, drinking Singapore slings in the long bar and beside pool all rounded off by dinner in the Tiffin room and breakfast outside by the fountain. Great service and all staff were helpful from the front of house to the wonderful cleaning staff . The suite was amazing , drinking G&T on the veranda and other saying hello to other guests checking in or off shopping was fun. Our only minor disappointment was not being aware that the writers bar required reservations which was not made clear on checking in . Though this might be our fault as we received a lot of info at check in by our wonderful butler . Check in and out was smooth and efficient and the whole experience was highly

title: A memorable stay.
desc: We stayed in the Raffles Singapore for what it turned out to be a most snack g and memorable experience ever in our stays in Singapore. We thoroughly enjoyed the hospitality of all staff at the Raffles Singapore. Truly a fine destination. There is only one Raffles Singapore.

title: Awesome stay! Bucketlist checked
desc: It was an awesome stay! We had a great history tour around Raffles Hotel, food was superb! It was my dream to stay in this hotel since I was a kid and glad to have experienced it and added to my bucket list this year. We'll definitely come back! It feels like home and not a hotel stay. Raffles Family Moto is real!

title: Service not even the movies could express
desc: There is a level of service at the Raffles that you can't even witness being provided in a movie. With unfathomable attention to detail, the staff here provide you with an experience worthy of royalty and nobility. Not to play off their signature phrase, but it is true. Never in our life did we think that a collective group of people could provide such a remarkable stay. We celebrated our honeymoon here and we couldn't be more grateful for the time and attention that was provided to us. The butlers actually printed out photos of our engagement and wedding to pose around our suite! They drew baths for use and got us reservations at places all over the city. It truly made exploring Singapore an effortless adventure. This hotel truly marked our visit to Singapore as one of the most

title: Best hotel EVER!!!!
desc: Nothing short of AMAZING!! One of the best hotels we have ever been to. It was our honeymoon, great location, very well trained and polite staff, breakfast was great. Everything was really good! Everyone was very nice! Our room was simply fantastic!! They had surprised us with some cake, champagne and flowers for our honeymoon, very attentive!! We would love to go back!!

title: Fantastic from start to end - terrific experience at such an iconic Hotel
desc: From arrival to departure with transfer by Raffles limousine, the experience was fantastic. We had arranged the stay as a stop over for a few days before flying onto Bali as a birthday treat. We were warmly greeted and escorted to our room to find hand made chocolates in the room etc. The room was large, comfortable, with a balcony and spotless. The Hotel is a credit and a must to visit for anyone visiting Singapore. All the staff were very helpful, friendly, nothing was too much trouble and efficient. Chef Zoey was brilliant, surprising me with a hand made chocolate sculpture (too good to eat but, we did) for the evening and a special breakfast. We cannot praise the staff enough - you are made to feel at home and like royalty. Everything was pristine with great attention to

title: Raffles is where I am wrapped in warmth and love
desc: Dear Mr Fisher, Please accept my heartfelt thanks to you and your efficient staff in making my 90th birthday so very exceptional. The memories will stay with me forever. The numerous complimentary gifts I received; Singapore slings, afternoon tea, beautiful flowers, cards & cake. I had to refrain from wearing my “90” badge because your staff kept giving me cakes! Thankfully there was not a cake with 90 candles on! I would like to mention several members of your staff; Sukhdiv for such a lovely welcome, Rohan and his very efficient waiters Raymond & Bernie. In addition my lovely Butlers, Jeremy could not have done more and Kimberly for allowing me to have her Mothers recipe for very refreshing tea. It is always the little things that mean so much. The History Tour with Mr

title: Good stay but quite disappointing compared to our first experience
desc: Our first stay at Raffles Singapore made it clear that the Grande Dame is a cut above the rest. This second visit, however, was marred by a number of service hiccups. It was a good experience on the whole, but quite far from the 11/10 we had expected at Raffles. There was a bit of a rough start to our visit this time, and only much later did we find out that you had assigned an intern to receive us and show us around. Despite her doing her best, we were kept waiting for an hour while our (paid) room upgrade got sorted out, and the complete debacle of a room tour after that didn't help our mood. Many of your fine employees - Alex, Mindy, and Anwar in particular - made things better afterwards and Raffles remains our most preferred hotel experience. However, we hope to

title: Perfection
desc: From the warm welcome to the seamless check-out, everything was marvellous. The rooms are a perfect blend of the old and the new, the bed is fantastic and the food and service are impeccable (they even remember your drinks orders for breakfast). The hotel is also situated in an ideal location, within a short walk you can be at incredible restraints, bars, museums and more. We can't wait to come back and stay again.

title: Raffles - with all the bells and whistles
desc: From the moment you step into this place, the magical experience starts. We had a courtyard suite and as the butler opens the door you know that you are going to have an experience like no other. The suite is huge and they have thought and considered every travellers need. It maybe classically styled but has all the hidden modern touches. I celebrated my birthday whilst staying here and was surprised to come back from breakfast to chocolates and an amazing cake. We experienced afternoon tea in the Grand Lobby - the food was delicious and washed down with champagne. Thanks to the historian was a wonderful tour - this is definitely a must do whilst here. One of our favourite spots was in Writters bar in the evening. Was so sorry to leave this hotel the staff sure know how to make

title: Irresistible Long Bar experience
desc: It is rarely worth queuing to gain entry to any restaurant or bar, I just don't have the patience but, for the Long Bar, it is a different matter. The experience here hasn't changed since I first went over 30 years ago - but the prices have! The decor is elegant and classy colonial, the clientele deliciously eclectic but the Singapore Slings taste the same as they always have. If you ask nicely at the bar, they will even let you operate the old mechanical English made Sling cocktail shaker machine. Be warned, you need strong arm muscles! The childish delight in throwing monkey nut cases over your shoulder on to the floor then crunching your way over them is as good as ever. A lovely and quite unique tradition.

title: Bucket list visit that did not disappoint.
desc: A must visit iconic hotel that lives up to its historical and first class reputation. Quiet, restful stay with the best sleep for a long time. The welcome, personalised check in and in room check out added to the exceptional experience. Recommend the historical tour if you have the time.

title: Bad experiences with unprofessional staffs
desc: -Staff messed up our booking. -Doorman try to stop me to enter even I'm carrying my luggage on my hand -staff only try to assist on baggage after we carry everything to the entrance. -Doorman was eyeing on my after 3 -4 staffs confirm I have a reservation. -2 different staffs called a few days before check-in but both forgotten and late to send out the email. -Staff came into my room immediately after ring the door bell and deliver birthday cake without cover. -Staff did not tell me there is a free heritage tour for all hotel guests. -Staff forgotten the birthday decoration after we change the room. -Butler deliver kueh without cover at the evening. -No phone, emergency button and air conditional in the gym, nothing change after 2 calls, went down to complaint to the

title: Amazing service that is unsurpassed!
desc: A beautiful and historic hotel combined with staff that put people first made our stay memorable. To start, we were greeted by the iconic doorman and subsequently another person to help up with our bags. Upfront, this already made us feel very welcome. Once inside, we were in awe at the beauty of the hotel, seeing it in person is indeed better than in pictures. The quaintess was heartwarming to say the least. When we got to our room near the Bras Basah wing, we were taken by the big space together with it's beautiful classic interior design. We were very happy to know that this will be our place to stay for almost a week. We stayed near the library and had a pleasant walk along there as well. We didn't expect much of the breakfast but it was a lot lot better than expected.

title: Raffles Hotel lives up to its great reputation
desc: Raffles Hotel lives up to its reputation as a top notch hotel with its inimitable historic architecture. An oasis with its courtyards and tropical gardens in the heart of the bustling city. We are made to feel welcomed throughout every touch point of our stay.

title: Raffles
desc: Great service by the whole team, the hotel was clean, the suites spacious with a balcony and the gym exceptional. Well spaced out with all of the imperative and new equipment.! We had high tea here and it was the best I have had worldwide.

title: Wonderful Afternoon Tea on Mother's Day
desc: Did high tea in Raffles Hotel for the first time with my family to celebrate mother's day and it was quite an experience. It's 80 dollars per person for the classic one includes coffee (yes can be refilled) as I prefer coffee than tea. We love the savory sandwiches and scones but the sweet ones are just ok. I think the price is worth it considering the ambiance, food and the service. My wife also got a mother's day gift which was a suprise. Btw, the pictures taken by the staff was impressive.

title: A wonderful return
desc: My wife and I returned to the Raffles to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary and had an amazing time at this iconic hotel. All the way from picture taking at the lobby to the suite, lunch at Tiffin room, drinks in the writes bar and amazing dinner at The Osteria. We truly enjoyed the short escape and congratulate the team on providing a memorable experience.

title: It was perfect
desc: Iconic, legacy experience, great food and service. Staying at Raffles Singapore is a legacy experience, the property is iconic with years of history, it reflects all around your stay and experience. This is surely one of the best luxury Hotels in the World. Food at Tiffin their Indian restaurant was amazing, the best in Singapore, but please remember to book in advance, its very popular even with locals and non-residents. The Singapore sling at long bar, being welcomed by their iconic Raffles doorman, all was amazing.

title: The superb customer service made Raffles a star for me
desc: From the minute we arrived my son and I were treated with genuine and authentic service. The check in within our suites was superb and then our butler Alicia Cheryl made our stay so incredibly memorable.
