desc: This was the second time in the Grand Dame each time back the experience was better than the last. We spent all our vacation days in 2020 on staycations and it would be an understatement if we said that the service at Raffles is second to none. We have travelled widely and stayed at hotels of every category - but we are proud that the best hotel is actually in our own backyard. The Raffles team has surpassed all of our expectations. From the comfortable limo ride to the warm welcome of the entire team at the front, the seamless check in, the attention to details by the butler. Everything was perfect this time! There were even little touches to enhance the already-opulent experience - the offer to take a photo as you walk into the beautiful lobby, the welcome Singapore Sling and

title: Beautiful Hotel Stay
desc: One of the most beautiful hotels I have ever stayed, it is one I would recommend to my family and friends. The staff are very professional, helpful, knowledgeable and polite. The building is so beautifully restored that it is nice to sit in the garden just to admire the architecture.

title: Superb! Simply Majestic!
desc: Had a lovely stay at the Raffles Hotel Singapore for one night. From start to finish, my experience here was absolutely flawless. Both check in & check out was a breeze too. We have stayed at some very good hotels but Raffles Singapore has shown us that they are in a class of their own. The hotel is majestic & elegant. The newly renovated suite is huge, spacious & beautiful with upscale finishes. Love the verandah & the palm court view. The staff were very welcoming & professional & that makes the difference at this property is their entire team that is warm & dedicated. To the butler team, you guys rock! Special thanks to Shobana, you are one of the best Front Desk staff we have ever encountered. Your friendly & can-do attitude is fantastic! Appreciate the room upgrade &

title: 10 anniversary staycation
desc: Top notch amenities, but service quality and room service food can be improved: - Room service wanton noodle, wantons uncooked pink inside. I called to give feedback, all I was told is that this will be relayed to the chef. No compensation or offer of a replacement. - Check-in butler was very polite, but did not inform us of history tour, he also did not place milk into our fridge as promised. - Checkout process was poor, incorrect bill and no one called to confirm, when I followed up I was passed between the concierge and a few other departments, no one called me back eventually. Only later in the evening after I left the hotel did I receive the email final bill.

title: Made my wife very happy!
desc: Couldn't have picked a better place to celebrate our 9th anniversary. All the attentions and service from the staff at the hotel were fabulous. The rooms, the food and the amenities are excellent. Will definitely be back!

title: Amazing architecture
desc: My husband and I had a great stay in this wonderful hotel. Stunning architecture, beautiful decoration and well curated. Service was attentive but not overwhelming. Good restaurant and bar variety. Definitely an icon and a must while in Singapore.

title: What a great stay
desc: A wonderful stay with truly excellent service in a property that takes you back in time. Love the room, and nothing was too much trouble. Butlers were excellent at any time of the day. The Tiffin Room is a must!

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: Staying at Raffles Hotel Singapore is an amazing experience and we would highly recommend it. Raffles provides beyond what other hotels could achieve, from the heritage building, overall environment, the atmosphere, the food quality and the best of all, the wonderful service. We found the Raffles staff to be extremely attentive and professional. Esmond at the front desk was wonderful to work with. Claren our butler met every need and the historian Nazir added so much to our trip. The women in the tiffin for breakfast were extremely attentive Desmond in the Tiffin room at night was an amazing waiter and Razi in the courtyard was wonderful to chat with! We are truly looking forward to returning to the Raffles Hotel.

title: Home away from home
desc: Warm hospitality makes it feel like home - if not better :). The service is friendly and attentive without being obtrusive. Staff remembered us from previous visits and others we had not met before greeted us by name. The restaurants extended the great service to accompany wonderful food. And it was nice to have the Writers Bar open again. Raffles is a tranquil oasis in the midst of a bustling city. Every visit is memorable and a truly refreshing break. We look forward to next time ...

title: Unforgettable experience
desc: One of the Worlds Great Hotels . Large very comfortable rooms, stunning architecture in a beautiful garden setting . Staff were very relaxed & friendly for a 5-6 star hotel and the butler service was great . Superb food at La Dame de Pic and great cocktails in the Writers bar . Loved every moment of our time there .

title: Great room and ambience
desc: Overall satisfied. Service is great from some staff but others may need slight improvement. Breakfast was average. I think the room and ambience, and the great service of the female staff during check-in and out takes the icing.

title: Live the myth
desc: Relax and indulge the mythic experience. Comes close to perfection if you add the Dame de Pic on the agenda of your stay. It is in the very details that you recognise the quality of service. From the pool staff to the concierge, you get to experience the world class quality of service.

title: Location, facility, shop and dinner venue around the hotel are excellent.
desc: Again we made the right choice to stay with Raffles for our wedding anniversary date. Look forward to going back next year. The suite of Lady Mountbatten was very impressive. Everything is the best !!!

title: once in a life time ....
desc: just do it! I really enjoy the hospitality and the room. The service staff were friendly, nice and not imposing. The room was huge and the technologies to control the various function in the room were intuitive. The hotel itself has soo much heritage and history to explore.

title: Spectacular Stay!
desc: A Wonderful luxurious stay enhanced with spectacular service from the Raffles team! From the moment of being warmly greeted by Keith and Francis at reception to my interactions with Grace Kiong, Sue Xian and Jeremy, we felt the Butlers ensured our needs were met for a comfortable stay. We enjoyed dining in the Grand Lobby ( Laksa is excellent! ) and appreciate the outstanding service from Gibson and Raymond. Alexander from the atmospheric Writer's Lounge creates cool unique cocktails too! We enjoyed the superb breakfast and delicious lunch dishes by Chef Kuldeep at the Tiffin room - attentive service from Nayan, Sarah and Ludette too! We look forward to our next magical memorable stay at Raffles!

title: Enjoyable Staycation
desc: When we reached they just asked about our booking name and within a few minutes, they brought us to our room and surprisingly our luggage it’s already inside. The room was nice and clean. There was chocolate and fruits to welcome you too! They also very high tech by using the iPad for closing the windows, on the tv and even to call them. The breakfast was great. Heritage tour was wonderful presented by Roslee. Must try the Singapore Sling drink it’s really nice. Both alcoholic and no alcoholic. In the morning my kids was playing soccer and when they come back they told us that the hotel give them a fruits water to keep their body hydrated. We was really amaze by their service from the start to the end. Raffles Hotel deserves more than 5 starts hotel. This is the most

title: This grand dame is beautiful in every way
desc: Raffles Hotel is very special to my husband and I as we were married there. We returned last week for our anniversary celebrations and everything was immaculate as we remembered. The thought that goes into everything is outstanding: the decor, the landscaping, the food and of course, the service is unparalleled. The grounds are well divided into public and private spaces so guests never feel intruded upon; visitors are rightfully welcome to stroll through the open spaces as it is a national monument. We especially enjoyed breakfast at the fountain courtyard, and sitting on the terrace reading, with the lawn before us. Everyone we encountered was so hospitable that I sometimes felt I was visiting a friend’s gigantic colonial home in the middle of the forest (thanks to to lush

title: Wonderful birthday celebration at La Dame de Pic
desc: Amazing heritage architecture design and wonderful staff A hotel stay is not complete without the excellent staff service. We found most of the staff at Raffles are very attentive, professional and the best of all, with a good sense of humour, which was a highlight! It lifts up the experience with a fun vibrant atmosphere. Francis Ng is a remarkable front service crew who tries his best to accommodate guests’ requests. Always delightful and a pleasure to talk to. He’s a great asset to Raffles and certainly makes the difference to the guests’ returning decisions in the future. Please acknowledge his wonderful efforts and we shall see him in the near future upon our return. Another highlight for our stay was the birthday celebration at La Dame de Pic. Food was excellent and the

title: Memorable Experience
desc: Excellent Hotel with top notch customer service and hospitality standards. Rooms are very comfortable, state of the art and have Internet of things concept (fully gadget controlled). Personal Butler at your service at all times during the stay. A wide range of food and drinks options to explore at the premise. Check-in, Checkout process is very smooth. No physical process mandatory at the reception desk. Experienced something unique and memorable for lifetime.

title: Very enjoyable stay with superbly great unmatchable service!
desc: Service was superb! Staff greets you along the way. Luggage was already arranged neatly when we got into the room. The room was nicely decorated with balloons for my son'sbirthday, with a handwritten birthday card for him. There were also Lego shaped chocolates and the butler brought in a chocolate mousse birthday cake and sang birthday song for him. She also gave a tour of the room and gadgets (the ipad can fully control lights, curtains and even TV like Netflix using the iPad). The room's decor is so intricate, even the room slippers is so posh. Kids' toiletries and bathrobe has a cute mascot design. Had Singapore Sling welcome drinks at the Grand Lounge, great service too (they provided complimentary orange juice for the kids and more nuts when my son requested for it). At

title: Simply heavenly
desc: Amazing stay at this iconic Singapore landmark. The staff are unobtrusive but attentive, friendly and welcoming. The suits decor is so beautiful, we had an amazing time and would definitely recommend to friends and family

title: One of a kind and splendid stay
desc: We are blown away by how the hospitality of Raffles Hotel staff from the bell boy, doorman, receptionist, butler, waitress, manager, resident historian. Everybody is simply amazing. It's one of a kind experience. We felt either being transported to Buckingham Palace or suddenly we are royalties. We love every bit of the room, every bit of Raffles Hotel and the delectable food served every morning at Tiffin Room. Our stay was pleasantly memorable which we will forever cherish in our hearts. We will definitely return to Raffles Hotel. Special mention to Saddiq who went beyond the extra mile to ensure we had a grand hotel experience at Raffles Hotel.

title: Fabulous, amazing experience!
desc: It was my 3rd or 4th time staying here at Raffles Hotel. Each time, i am so amazed by the service and hospitality that the staff has given to us. They have even simplified the check-in and check-out process. You can do it the room without any hassle and of course no need to queue and zero waiting time. Love the room, the ambience, the food, the service and it is just amazing.

title: Wonderful staycation at the Raffles Hotel, Singapore
desc: We had a lovely two-night stay at the Raffles Hotel, Singapore. The hotel is truly rich in history and the renovation and restoration has been sympathetically done, resulting in a wonderful blend of the traditional and the modern. Truly no other hotel like this in Singapore. The palm court suite was gorgeous - spacious, well laid out, and worth every penny. Special thanks to the wonderful staff who made our stay extra special: Mr Roslee, for the engaging and interesting history tour - you are a fountain of knowledge and a delightful ambassador for the hotel and for Singapore. Thanks too, to Kimberley and Jiyeon who gave a us a warm welcome to the hotel and the smoothest check-in experience ever. And thank you to all the other staff who all clearly take pride in their jobs

title: An Oasis in the City
desc: Beautiful hotel with excellent service. Though located centrally, you truly feel at rest. The staff are attentive and friendly, and every need is catered too. They particularly went out of their way to make my son’s first birthday an unforgettable one.

title: Iconic Stay
desc: Resevations Team has a lot to improve on, Service at Tiffin Room could have been more pleasant. Join the complimentary history tour for a better insight of history and current. The classy, spacious, historical features of hotel and suite, will outshine the rest of 5 stars hotels in S'pore. Well-located near transport, food, shopping and places of interests. Try at least 1 stay whether you are a Singaporean or in Singapore for a visit.

title: ‘Welcome Home’
desc: From the moment that we were greeted with ‘Welcome home’ on arrival until the moment we left when the team waved us off, we very much felt like we were part of the Raffles family. We’ve now stayed at Raffles quite a few times on staycations and it never gets tired or old - there is always something new to discover and new ways for the hotel and teams that work there to surprise you. This time we stayed for my birthday and fair to say that Raffles pushed the boat out with champagne in the room and an unbelievable gift that literally brought tears to my eyes. As always - butler service was exemplary (thanks Grace and team), rooms were immaculate, Writers Bar welcoming and a great spot to spend a few hours, and food delicious! Long may we be able to stay at ‘home’!

title: Best Staycation ever!
desc: We are just back from a 2 night family staycation at the gorgeous Raffles Hotel. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The free upgrade to a Palm Court Suite was a lovely gesture 🥰 The Afternoon Tea at the Grand Lobby was delectable and the complimentary breakfast at The Tiffin Room was delicious and generous. The History tour with Leslie Danker was very interesting. The beautiful gardens, the tasteful architecture, antiques and interiors and the immaculate service truly lived up to the Raffles name. We hope to be back someday! Go check it out for yourself 🥰

title: Great stay
desc: One of, if not the most luxurious stay that can be enjoyed in Singapore. The recent upgrades to the hotel has taken it up several notches. The swimming pool is a little on the small side but that didn’t deter our kids from giving Raffles Hotel all their thumbs up!

title: Raffles Hotel Singapore
desc: Few hotels in the world can claim to have a historical landmark status, call themselves a national monument or a 'must visit' tourist attraction. But Raffles ain't no ordinary spend a night kind accommodation. You'd be cursing yourself or questioning the mental ability of the people if you were sent here for a business stay. Yes it does have rooms for paying guests, exquisite restaurants to dine in, famous Long bar for those sling shots, lobbies, pool, spa and all the other usuals. But the way it presents it in such classy, elegant and refined manner is something different. Vintage architecture, high ceilings, long corridors, bright rooms, marble floors, tropical atmosphere. It's a lovely blend of luxury, boutique and style. Glamorous interior design doesn't just end indoors,

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent stay, friendly & helpful staffs (Jeff), guided us on the smart feature of the room facility and walk us around the hotel compound with introduction 😄. The room is nicely decorated and super clean. Comfortable to stay for whole family in particularly my elderly 81 years old mum. Very helpful and friendly restaurants staffs, who has greeted us with smile and introduce the foods. Well done all, keep up the good job !

title: Excellent Services
desc: It really worth to stay at First Hotel in Singapore. Services is excellent, food quality is good, all the staffs is friendly and go the extra mile for you. It just a very plesant stay in the hotel. Will go back again

title: Sublime Staycation
desc: The whole experience was an eye opener. The hotel is very well maintained. Food was excellent. What’s most impressive is the service that we had. All these have made Raffles Hotel the benchmark for our future staycations.

title: An iconic landmark rich with history - fit for a Queen
desc: The oldest hotel in Singapore, kept to the highest standards by dedicated staff - fit for a Queen, and indeed Queen Elizabeth stayed here. Every staff is friendly and helpful. The facilities and grounds are spotless. Many staff were able to address us by name on the second day - very pleasantly surprised. Thank you.

title: A return to our favourite Hotel!
desc: Like everyone else in the world, we haven't been able to travel over the last 12 months or so, but we are fortunate to live in Singapore, so we have been able to try out some of the local hotels for Staycations, and we have had some really good experiences, however nothing that quite matches "The Grand Dame", Raffles. This was our second stay here, we were welcomed "back home", I wish! Breakfast by the fountain was lovely, Butler on call for whatever we want, even bringing us nuts from the long bar one evening. We had dinner at the Tiffin room, again super attentive staff, and relaxing by the pool was pure luxury. The Suites are fantastic, and service second to none. We spent two nights this stay, and to be honest we didn't want to leave. I'm really looking forward to

title: Amazing 2Nights stay @ Raffles hotel
desc: We decided to go for a 2 night staycation @ Raffles hotel to celebrate our 5th year anniversary. Everything was very smooth from beginning to the end. The pre-online check-in was very efficient as we didn't have to do anything when we arrived at the hotel. The staff went beyond to make us feel comfortable and address any need we had. The facilities were easy to book and even for the limited time (1.5h) at the pool this is only to get an umbrella seat so we could enjoy the pool for couple of hours in the other chairs (without any umbrella). My wife did a 90minutes absolute relaxation massage and she mentioned it was the best she had in her life The food options were great , strongly recommend the afternoon tea and the breakfast was good with great variety of options.

title: Elegance, luxury and attention to detail - amazing trip!
desc: A weekend staycation for a special birthday - staff and whole hotel experience was exceptional Accommodation was perfect and faultless History tour was great - a real incite into the amazing history of Raffles Hotel Food and Beverage - was perfect in all establishments For a special occasion I don't think there is a better hotel!

title: Fantastic service
desc: Pricey but service is top notch, a standard all other hotels should follow. Appreciated the butler service. Any issues were dealt with promptly. More signs could have been indicated within the hotel for better directions tho. I thought the gates could not be opened from the inside so I was "trapped" for a while!

title: Fabulous Easter weekend
desc: We've lived in Singapore for 3 years and decided to do a staycation here. We had a lovely suite overlooking a quiet courtyard which was such a peaceful setting. The food was incredible, with lunch at the Chinese restaurant and dinner at La Dame de Pic. Definitely do the history tour to learn about the early days and all the famous people who've stayed there. The service is top-notch from start to finish.

title: Decent stay but we never felt like we are guests there. A one-off stay.
desc: We decided to experience the hype about Raffles Hotel after watching their documentary at Channel News Asia. As such, I used my SRV for a stay here for 2 nights. I completed their pre-arrival check in so that really sped up the check-in process. We were led to our Courtyard Suite immediately by the service staff at the lobby. The room was huge and well-appointed. Our butler didn't manage to show us around our room as we had a lunch reservation and we couldn't wait for her. I guess she was busy but she did say she would come by later. We tried their in-room dining and the food was excellent. We didn't had to wait for the food to be delivered and our butler did a good job laying out the food for us. Breakfast was a mixed affair as on the 2nd day, my wife was served bacon in

title: Beyond what i've expected
desc: The hotel didn't inspire confidence at first, given the replies before payment. Wrong dates given in emails, slow replies. After payment, it was as though another team took over completely, and replies were speedy. Replies after the stay seem to have slowed down. This was the only inconsistent thing about Raffles, which makes me feel like quality service is only for the people who have paid up for their trip. That being said, I still found my experience with Raffles pleasant. I arrived at Raffles and a photo was taken for us at the grand lobby. I expected to be sold the photo, but it was printed for us and left in the suite's table during the turn down service. The service staff also escorted me and my guests to the suite, which they felt was a personal touch as well.

title: Precious Experience
desc: It was very memorable stay. From welcome to leaving, I had received great services. I could feel history and elegant through environment and atmosphere. Despite located in city centre, I could escape from hustle and bustle, and totally I had relaxed time under such an unusual condition in the world. Lovely to stay, I am proud of myself to decide to do staycation here.

title: Ridiculous service from Raffles hotel
desc: I tried to call Raffles hotel mainline last evening regarding my high tea reservation for today (07 apr 21). I was placed on hold for 26mins + without managing to speak to anyone. See screen grab. My friend also attempted to call the hotel twice during office hours on the same day. Likewise no one picked up. I gave up eventually and I leave a message on their Facebook messenger. I received a call back at 3pm today, i told the lady (did not managed to get her name) that I am already in the hotel lobby. Without asking what was my initial request, Her immediate response, "oh ok, goodbye then" I asked if she is coming to the lobby to speak to me, which she responded as no. She is not located in the hotel but in another office. I shared with her my feedback regarding

title: Perfect Staycation
desc: Although we made a very last-minute booking, the hotel managed to get the room ready for about an hour. Our butler, Sue Xian was excellent. The staff were very welcoming and efficient housekeeping service. Check-in and check-out process was very smooth. Despite being in the city, our room was quiet. kids love to stay here.

title: A dream stay, simply beautiful...
desc: We came to Raffles Singapore to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Everything was perfect, the hotel is splendid, the food delicious, the butlers are amazing and the weather was great. Everything was above and beyond our expectations! We will definitively be looking forward to coming back!

title: M Thompsett
desc: Fabulous two days staycation in a palm court suite . Luxurious surroundings , Jeff our personal butler deserves a mention, excellent food and outstanding Service. We didn’t want to leave ! Highly recommended.

title: Amazing stay at the iconic Raffles Hotel in Singapore
desc: Everything was amazing. The food, the room, the breakfast, the swimming pool, the restaurants and the bar. It was a bit cumbersome to arrange the bookings due to COVID restrictions but once in each experience was delightful and worth the money.

title: Relive of the 19 century Glamour
desc: Raffles Hotel Singapore is more then just an iconic building of Singapore history. It is also filled people whom are willing to make your stay even more beautiful and memorable. The food are marvellous and local dishes are surprisingly authentic. Definitely a place you would love to go back.

title: Anniversary break. Amazing
desc: The beat hotel we have ever stayed at ! Service amazing. Palm court suite beautiful , restaurants and food amazing . Renovations very tasteful. Would go back for sure 2 night stay. Pool delightful and grounds amazing. Lived up to the hype for sure. Thank you raffles

title: It is an experience we don't want to be once-in-a-lifetime
desc: The hotel with its rich history is an attraction itself. The tour by the resident historian, which brought us to the Presidential Suite, made the stay all the more memorable. The service was impeccable, the facilities were augmented by technology (iPad controlled air con and lighting!). Definitely hope to be back again!

title: Spoilcation
desc: If you're looking to chill and enjoy a 'spoilcation', then you couldn't do better than Raffles. With lovely garden and lounge areas to wallow in, there's space to rejuvinate - art to enjoy too. The stand alone bathtub has to be mentioned - great to luxuriate in with bubbles (glass and tub appropriate, of course). Service is Raffles' superpower - pleasant not pushy. Love being welcomed 'home' - a nice touch.

title: 99% Perfection!
desc: I have been wanting to stay at the legendary iconic hotel of Singapore, but I never had the chance until lately. It was my 3 days 2 nights stay at this beautifully renovated hotel. I arrived slightly early around noon, as the hotel’s representative called me a day before to check on my arrival schedule and see if they could accord me an early arrival. My request was granted, thanks to their generosity and hospitality. I parked my car at the basement carpark, there is no direct lift to the hotel lobby. Though they do provide complimentary valet parking or you can park your vehicle at the hotel entrance but there is no shelter, I prefer to have my car parked at the basement instead. It is quite a long walk through the arcade, but it is OK. We were given the option and our

title: Perfect staycation
desc: Great place to get well relaxation. The outstanding service very impressive. Highly customer oriented. Fantastic food and drink provided. And you can feel Raffles spirit during the stay from its awesome team with proudness

title: Fantastic Long Weekend Staycation
desc: What an AMAZING Birthday weekend away! One of the only upsides of this bizarre ‘non-travelling’ time is the great deals to be had in local hotels! To say the service at Raffles Hotel Singapore is good is an understatement. The staff here are sweet, thoughtful and one step ahead at all times, I can’t fault this beautifully refurbished ‘Grande Old Dame’ and left feeling rested and rejuvenated. Highly recommend the massage here too, one of the best I have had in my 15 yrs living in Asia! A huge thank you for looking after me and making me feel so special!

title: Standout Historical Tour and outstanding service
desc: Service was exemplary in terms of staff attentiveness, responsiveness and overall customer service. But choice of restaurants were limited due to lock down. Breakfast menu was disappointing but the historical tour was a standout though.

title: Perfect for a staycation
desc: Checked in for three nights to the Sarkies Brothers’ Suite. Amazingly well maintained rustic charm of the past blended beautifully with modern IT logic. My family and I enjoyed so much that staying literally 90% of our time in the suite during “lockdown” felt like an overseas holiday! We came with really high expectations and left with a grateful heart. Thank you to GM Christian Westbeld and his amazing team for an impeccable experience! Truly a class above the rest.

title: Cozy, well-curated Oasis experience during a lockdown
desc: Raffles is known for "You arrive as guests, leave as friends, and return as family." I have booked this stay before the lockdown is eased to get some respite from the busy work, and I, indeed, was welcomed back home as family, pampered through an Oasis experience, being upgraded to a Personality Suite located at the property's Courtyard Gardens. Sin Jie invited me to have a photo taken at the Grand Lobby before heralding me to suite - she was very nice and cheerful; afterwhich, my Butler Neesha gave me the orientation. True to the Raffles' spirit, service is a gentle breeze - everything was well-appointed and in place: they know whenever step out of the suite and when I come back the room has already been tidied spic and span. All my conversations with my butler were always

title: Amazing design, service and overall experience!
desc: Wow! What an experience. Such a classy level of service and that "welcome home" slogan suits this to a tee. The atmosphere and every single staff member made this a Wedding Anniversary we will never forget.

title: Best hotel experience ever
desc: The checking in and out process was extremely smooth. The Raffles Hotel butlers went out of their way to ensure our family was well taken care of throughout our three day stay. The Historian who took us on our History Tour, Roslee, was most knowledgeable and engaging, as he wowed us with his stories. The Hotel is a beautiful oasis in the middle of a busy city, and its rich history adds to the wonderful experience for my family.

title: Excellent staycation at Raffles
desc: My family or 5 had a great staycation at Raffles Singapore. The service was impeccable from the moment I got out of my car at the drivethru to the tome I checked out and stepped into my car. The room was so new and with 4 TVs in our 2 suites, everyone could cast Netflix or watch ever they want from the hote iPads. With a parlour in each suite, everyone had their own space; perfect for the teenage kids. Wife had a great spa and the food from the hotel, Tiffin Room in particular was awesome! Overall all 5 of us had a great time. Thanks Raffles!

title: Excellent Service
desc: Check-in was simple and fast. All staff were warm & friendly throughout our stay, always able to anticipate & accommodate our needs. Room and hotel premises were very clean. Bed was comfortable, and toiletries were good quality. Tablet controls (UI) for room functions and amenities were easy to use. We loved that we only had to dial one number for "butler" to take care of all our needs.

title: Excellent staycation at Raffles Hotel Singapore
desc: Service was excellent with the staff going extra miles. The suite was spacious and very comfortable. Food were great especially the bread and pastries. Strongly recommended for people who like to have an unique experience of staycation.

title: Incredible staycation for my husband's 40th
desc: We stayed at Raffles during circuit breaker light and the experience could not have been better! The staff constantly went the extra mile for us, we had the pool to ourselves for most of the stay and decorations placed in the room before our arrival. We were even offered early check in and late check out to accommodate my son's nap times. Couldn't have asked for more and we hardly noticed that none of the restaurants were open. Thank you so so much!

title: Great location, amazing service!
desc: Celebrated my birthday at Raffles and I was not disappointed! Smooth check-in with a personalised card and even received a small cake and some balloons in the room. Breakfast was extremely good as well. Overall, there's simply nothing that isn't top notch at Raffles.

title: Cosy and comfortable staycation
desc: Enjoyable stay at Raffles Hotel. Due to Covid 19 and for the safety of individual , hence, having enjoyable hi tea in the room followed by dinner in the room as well. You have a choice to seat outside your room and enjoy the serene greenery as well while having your high tea or dinner as well. Staffs are friendly and doing their best to accommodate and that’s makes the different when staying with them. Sun tanning at the pool deck is most enjoyable as there is privacy and less crowd. Relaxing , reading book and article. Would go back again when i can as there is lots of privacy in this hotel.

title: Excellent experience
desc: I had an amazing experience. Luxurious amenities aside, the service was attentive, responsive, and fantastically friendly. We were celebrating our daughter's first birthday and the team surprised us with tarts, balloons, and a doll of the hotel mascot! Additionally, the lobby and surrounding areas were quiet and peaceful, definitely a great place to recharge!

title: Fantastic stay
desc: We had a wonderful time at Raffles Hotel. The staff were friendly and very helpful throughout our stay. The food was good and the butlers were responsive at all hours, helping us out with any issues that arose. Thank you!

title: Memories to Last
desc: My wife and I traveled from Hawaii, US to Singapore, were quarantined for 21 days and decided to celebrate our anniversary at the iconic Raffles Hotel SG a few weeks ago. We booked for 2 nights and ended up extending our stay for another 2 nights, because Raffles Hotel SG was just uniquely extra-ordinary. Both Mrs and I are in the hospitality industry for over 30 years; we had sampled many hotels throughout our globetrotting and stayed at many fancy hotels/resorts. Hands down, our experience at the recently restored Raffles Hotel SG had surpassed them all. The recently renovated/restored Raffles SG is a harmonious blend of the "traditional old-world elegance and the "modern" touches...from the gigantic double doors leading to our suite (upgraded by grace), leather

title: I didn't want to leave.
desc: We had a wonderful time there. The staff is wonderful and we especially enjoyed the the Historical tour by Roslee. The Tiffin Room is a wonderful treat and the location means it it easy to visit the National Gallery. I think this is the top colonial era hotel in Asia. I for one will be back.

title: Memorable staycation in Singapore
desc: Have always wanted to stay at this landmark in Singapore. Book a staycation with the Mrs to celebrate our birthdays. Pleasantly surprised by the birthday cake the hotel arranged for us. We were really well taken care of by the staff. The history tour is a must if you visit this hotel. Had so much fun with Roslee as the history tour guids

title: Outstanding
desc: Nothing was too much trouble for your team and everyone from the gentleman who took our car to the butler ensured that this was a stay of a lifetime! Our whole family turned up in our Honda Jazz looking for the car park...you were happy to park it at the front of the hotel! You then welcomed us like we were the only people staying! Our photo is a moment we will keep. The suite was perfect and you even brought a cake for our birthdays! We had a fascinating history lesson from Leslie and he even signed my book. Breakfast was gorgeous and the gift shop fabulous. Whilst the hotel is remarkable- we sampled the pool, explored the buildings and enjoyed the courtyard, it was the staff that made it special. Everyone was simply welcoming, kind and smiling (despite the COVID

title: Home away from Home
desc: We had a great stay at Raffles, that at the end of 2 days, we really didn't wanna leave the place. Especially when it comes to hospitality - Mr. Keith, Mr. Roslee, Ms Latifa, all of them had something that made them stand out in terms of the way they communicated and made us feel at home. Not to mention, we learnt a lot from Mr. Roslee. We look forward to going back soon :)

title: Staycation
desc: It was a wonderful experience. The staff are amazing and looked after us extremely well. It was also my birthday on check in day and the staff went out of there way to make this memorable. We had dinner at The Tiffin Room which was excellent. Breakfast was good even with the restrictions. History tour was great.

title: stay over phase 2
desc: Overall great stay. Staff were mostly well meaning and well-intentioned, though, sometimes, sometimes wanting in finesse: the diff between eating at a coffeeshop with a friendly aunty who is generous and well meaning; and eating at a 3 Michelin with knowing and caring and attentive staff. This lacking in particular translated into requests for tea. I was asked 4 times by 4 diff butlers about my tea requests, which meant that there was no internal staff communication: imagine being asked about my dietary requests 4 times by 4 wait staff in a 3 Michelin restaurant. Also, my wine glasses were not not replenished on a daily basis when my room was made up by housekeeping and a shaving set was not provided till i asked. Overall though, it really was a good stay, the hotel has

title: Anniversary celebration
desc: Everything was wonderful from start to finish. Suite, staff, food and beverage, facilities. We were made to feel that the staff cared about our enjoyment. It was the perfect anniversary weekend staycation.

title: That's how special it is!
desc: Great service, food , wine and amazing historic tour. We visited long bar, butcher's block, writers bar , Tiffin Room and had a wonderful hightea at Raffles hotel. Room was spacious and we felt at home. Definitely will go back Raffles hotel again.

title: Raffles Staycation
desc: Fantastic staycation during COVID-19 restrictions. We booked through Scott Dunn Travel Agent and got buy one night, get the 2nd night free. They were kind enough to give us early check in and late check out. Great food, good drinks, and really friendly and professional staff. Rooms are very large and fully controlled by ipad. There is a butler on hand if needed. You can choose from a pillow menu when you arrive in the room. Highly recommend to do once when in Singapore.

title: Impeccable service
desc: Had a wonderful stay at the hotel. Was very impressed with the hotel staff service. The hotel was very kind to give me a cake to celebrate my birthday. I was really touched by the hotel’s kind gesture.

title: Brilliant hotel for a staycation
desc: Could not fault our 2-night stay at Raffles Hotel Singapore - perfect hotel, wonderful food, brilliant service. We stayed in a State Room Suite but if I stayed here again I would probably aim to go for a Courtyard Suite for the slightly better ambience (more surrounded by greenery!)

title: Nicely Restored Grand Olde Dame
desc: With restrictions on overseas travel, Raffles Singapore is an ideal place for a Singapore staycation. The property has been recently restored and updated with 21st century gadgets such as iPad to control TV, lights, room temperature and curtains etc whilst retaining much of its original character and charm. A good selection of Newspapers and magazines were also available on the iPad. Property was very well maintained. We stayed in the stateroom suite located in the bras Basah wing. Although facing Raffles City and next to the main road, the suite was well insulated from traffic noise from the main road. Although the Suite was well appointed and tastefully furnished with plenty of space in the parlour and sleeping area, we prefer the entrance to the room and the dressing table

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: Excellent experience staying at Raffles Hotel. They did a great job with the refurb. I really enjoyed the History Tour. Such a historic place! Highly recommended. The Hightea at the Grand Lobby was very grand and up to expectations.

title: Raffles Staycation
desc: From our arrival to departure, the staff was impeccable in their services in the various areas, whether it was at the restaurant, check-in or various amenities. Suite was gorgeous and we were so glad we went for the History tour as we learned so much more about the hotel! The $50 credit, 15% discount for all dining as well as return vouchers are welcome treats for guests. I must say this has been one of my most memorable staycations to date. Thank you to all the staff for making our stay such a pleasant one! We will definitely be back as guests at the hotel or the dining establishments.

title: The Iconic Hotel's Reputation is Well Deserved!
desc: My wife and I were fortunate enough to have the opportunity to recently spend two nights at Raffles Hotel, to celebrate our silver (25th) wedding anniversary. Upon arrival, we were informed that our booking had been upgraded and we were now staying in the Lady Mountbatten Suite. The quality of the suite's furniture and fixtures is truly exceptional, but pales insignificance when compared to the exceptional service that was provided by all the staff in the hotel's bars and restaurants, and particularly the suite's butlers on a 24-hour basis. I'd like to take this opportunity to specifically thank both Claren and John personally. Both my wife and I cannot thank you all enough for helping us to celebrate and make this landmark in our marriage such a special, unforgettable

title: Excellent Experience with excellent service
desc: We were very well looked after by all your staff including butler Jeffrey and especially your front office manager Grace Kiong and Akira. All your staff made us feel at home. I appreciated the empowerment given to your staff like allowing us to bring an extra person for breakfast. There was always a positive response to all request. The suite was stunning and we appreciated the upgrade.

title: We are coming back soon.
desc: Excellent hotel , ambience and great hospitality by Tanya during lunch and dinner at the restaurant. The dishes suggested by her were too delicious , due to this wonderful experience we will once again visit Raffles with our family. The best host to connect with. Thanks for making our experience a memorable one. The best place to stay at inUdaipur. We will be coming back soon.

title: Magical Time Capsule
desc: We stayed at the Raffles as a family, three of us - staycation - and loved it. Surprisingly, we are as relaxed as if we had actually travelled somewhere. And in a way we did. The Raffles Singapore is a universe onto itself, even more fabulous after the recent renovation. It feels like stepping back in time, certainly like stepping out of Singapore which after a long time of not being able to travel anywhere was sorely needed. History is everywhere in the Raffles - well worth participating in the history tour by the lovely local historian who has a lot of stories and little details one would otherwise never know. The hotel is a rather large complex consisting of the main building in all its colonial splendour with a very chic enormous new chandelier in the main lobby and various

title: Amazing Stay! Expected nothing less and was correct in every way!
desc: I can only say that my Raffles experience was just amazing! from the front of house staff to the butlers, pool attendants, doorman... never ending! nothing was too much trouble and it was quite frankly amazing. Stayed last in Raffles in 2007 but due to living in Singapore and being a musician I have played and performed for both the closing pre refurb and the opening in more recent years. I last entered the doors to perform for the Ferrari owners club in Dec 2019 so comiing back was like being home! This place is just amazing............ if you get the chance to go, You will not be disappointed. Palm Courtyard suites highly recommended. Thanks Raffles... I will be back!

title: Fantastic Staycation.
desc: What an amazing hotel. Staff are so friendly and extremely professional. The options for dining in the hotel are really great. Check in and check out was so trouble free. I had such a lovely time there.

title: Truly wonderful
desc: Some friends and I choose Raffles to celebrate a milestone birthday. Booking was made easy due to the wonderful people on the end of the phone and our check-in upon arriving was quick and seamless. As expected, nothing was too much trouble and my friends and I were sorry to leave. Such a wonderful experience and I feel so lucky to have the opportunity to finally stay at this iconic and landmark hotel.

title: Great 3D2N Raffles Staycay despite minor hiccups
desc: Arrival at Grand Lobby – We arrived to an empty Grand Lobby and were welcomed by a hoard of staff. I didn’t have to present the QR code as they found my reservation using my last name and we were whisked away to do an in-room check in after a seated wait of 10mins. Check In – We were escorted to our room for an in-room check in and were asked for our IDs (which I thought was weird as we had already furnished it during the online registration). Nothing else was required from us after that and we were asked if it was appropriate for our butler to come by and walk us through the room features. Suite – My State Room Suite, 357, was really really nice and erm stately haha! At 67SqM, the space which would be my home for the next 2 nights was more than enough to accommodate a large

title: Memorable stay at the Raffles Hotel
desc: We have always enjoyed our stay at Raffles hotel but this time it is even better. The happy greetings from Elvina (I hope I got her name right) when we arrived set the tone to a wonderful stay at the Raffles. Excellent service from Bernie who made us feel so special and special mention to Raymond, Rosli, Altea and the many who made our staycation so memorable. We will be back and would highly recommend anyone who would like to experience a wonderful, memorable staycation at Raffles hotel.

title: Kid-friendly educational stay!
desc: We are a family of 2 adults and 3 children. Having 2 connecting Stateroom suites accommodates the 5 of us comfortably, more than ample space. The suites were huge! So much so the children "complained" about the long walk to the bathroom from the living room. We could feel personal touches and customisation in the suites. Nintendo switch was set up in the children's suite, that kept them occupied the whole time! Children books were also found on the bookshelves. Happy kids, happy parents! We really felt at home, we were pampered by the meticulous turndown service each evening, with bottles of water replenished and the fruit bowl was always topped up. We slept soundly each night on the comfortable bedding and we really like thr pillow menu! We also like how we can control almost

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Raffles is a real sensory experience. From the feel of the place to the cleanliness to the service provided by the staff, you will not regret the time you spend here. The suites are jaw dropping and to be honest, you won’t want to get out of the room. Nestled in a building rich in heritage, exploring the rooms and the nooks and crannies of the hotel is sufficient to wild your day away. The butlers attend to your every need and make you feel like a queen without the crown :)

title: Afternoon tea
desc: This tea is worth the wait. Every aspect of it was luxurious and the scones kept on coming. The ambiance was outstanding. I will be returning in September for another afternoon tea at Raffles. I actually visited in August 2019.

title: The story continues…
desc: Many of us have bucket lists. To me this included Raffles Hotel Singapore. For years I imagined visiting. First in 2017 on a stopover to Singapore but we ended up changing plans, then in 2019 but timing did not allow for it. Finally in 2021 I would not only visit but get to host our wedding ceremony here. If you love colonial architecture as I do, it does not get better than The Grand Dame. The attention to detail in everything is remarkable, from the upkeep of this historical landmark to the thoughtfulness that was placed to every aspect during its massive renovation. The hotel comes to life through its high spirited team. They work together like a well oiled engine and stand out as individuals. From the butlers (Ancy, Alicia, Suleiman, Sunny, Neesha, Xu Xian, Yu Jun & Jeff),

title: And the dish ran away with the spoon!
desc: A hotel as iconic as the Raffles Hotel with only suite rooms at over a 1000usd rack rates a night does set expectations high. I am not sure if the pandemic saw staff strength cut but end day a guest is a guest and impeccable service needs to be delivered. This was not to be. We experienced many hiccups using the butler service, which I guess it was 1 poor butler to many rooms, everything was on foot, he had to come to you, take the instruction and come back with it. Quite senseless to be honest, one phone call and isnt it quicker? As such a simple teaspoon went around the moon and back, and other countless things. Then is the irony of technology, a nice ipad where you could do such wonderous things with it became quite a white elephant for controlling curtains and lights. What

title: Relaxing Staycation
desc: Everything exceeded our expectations- the whole hotel is just stunning and it feels like a tranquil retreat hiding in the CBD. The room is well designed and beautiful, our time around the pool was very relaxing and our meals were yummy. We stayed during the PH2HA so didn’t get to experience the dine in options- but in a way we loved the chance to spend more time in our beautiful room and on the veranda overlooking Palm Court.

title: Everyone should experience the Raffles' legend
desc: Did a 2 night stay last week at the Courtyard suite. It is certainly not a legend. The service is phenomenal. From the time we are welcomed at the entrance, to the lady who checked us in, and the butlers during our stay, there was nothing but excellence. Despite the hiccup over power supply, they were very quick with service recovery. This is quite unlike another hotel nearby which was extremely defensive over the timings when a similar incident happened. The Heritage dinner, breakfast, afternoon tea and mooncakes were fantastic. #Supportlocal #Raffleslegend See you again next month!

title: Quality
desc: It's the first time such a beautiful place and I had a nice breakfast. Thanks for everything. I would go first. The waiters of the place I would go to were very nice. They did not disturb us at all. They gave us unlimited tea and coffee as a treat. Thanks for everything, the cooks were also very good hand taste. it was very nice

title: Great stay and excellent service
desc: My sis and I stayed at raffles hotel on a weekday. My sis is 8 months pregnant and the staff were really attentive to her! The day before check in they offered to let us check in earlier so she may rest in the suite before our history tour. they also offered to change the welcome drink to something non alcoholic. The history tour was really awesome, shout out to roslene for his engaging tour and you can tell he’s really passionate about his job! The service at raffles hotel is top notch, everything was smooth from the check in to check out!

title: Our Raffles experience - one of our best decisions ever
desc: We very rarely write reviews, let alone a lengthy one. Yet, this time we feel we have to, so that we may give the hotel the credit it deserves. We held our Wedding Solemnisation and Reception at Raffles Singapore's Jubilee Ballroom on 18 Sep 2021. It was clearly one of our best decisions ever. Planning for a wedding during the pandemic period was psychologically stressful, but both my husband & I agreed that choosing Raffles Singapore as our wedding location was a blessed decision. Raffles Singapore clearly stood way out from the other hotels we have been to (both local and overseas) with its impeccable service - from its employees' proactiveness, thoughtfulness, meticulousness, to the hotel's beautiful unique colonial facade and decor, to the top-notch facilities available.

title: Amazing Raffles hotel experience
desc: Me and my husband chose Raffles hotel for our 5 year anniversary staycay. We enjoyed our stay tremendously and service was exceptional! A big thank you to Mr Roslee Sukar who went the extra mile of making our stay a memorable one. He also took the time to recommend and show us the different suites available when we met him a week before our stay for the history tour. We would recommend attending the history tour that he conducts as it was definitely one of the highlights of our stay. We absolutely loved our suite in the palm court wing which had a beautiful view of the main building. Staffs were really attentive, warm and friendly. Front desk Ms Amelia was great as well. Our check in was efficient and she recognised and handled my guests very well. Loved how digitalized the

title: Warm welcome homely stay
desc: We booked 2 suites for staycation during the school holidays. It started with warm and welcoming check in with friendly staff. However, the phone is not working for one of the suites. Butler Cheryl offered an additional $100 rebate and an emergency contact. We received a complimentary glass of white wine on the last night as well. Though the non working phone brought us inconvenience, we appreciate the efforts from all butlers. They also miss out sending my breakfast on the last day but quickly came after informing them. The other miss out was a history tour that was part of the package. This was not mentioned during the stay and I only realised it after checkout. Overall it was a relaxing stay and a nice spa experience. We certainly hope to be back soon.

title: The ultimate staycay
desc: Stayed in the leading room category of a stateroom suite, and it was a stately in every way. 67 Square metres, one can literally run within the space. Most of the electrical were smart control- the system even allows one to log into Netflix. The best thing of all was Butler service, and I had the opportunity to encounter Amanda. She was enthusiastic, and personable, and interacted warmly. She even remembered a request for hot chocolate made in the afternoon that she delivered at night. She was amazing and made the stay a truly memorable one. Thanks Amanda and the team for a wonderful stay.

title: Well located, nostalgic, good service
desc: It has been a good staycation for us, kids love the place very much, particularly the butler service has been very prompt and friendly. It is nice to see that the room facilities have been digitalized which gives us much more convenience by the tip of the finger. It would have been perfect if the ceiling fan is integrated digitally too.

title: Incredible! Can't flaw anything
desc: Through and through we were welcomed with tremendous service during our stay at Raffles as a couple. It was the best way to immerse into the history of Singapore in a very elegant and classic manner. We would highly recommend this to all our friends and family. It was worth the money and a very memorable experience. The revamp work of the interiors felt very modern and clean. We would also recommend visiting Butcher's Block, a drink outside (happy hour!) by Courtyard or Oysteria Bar for yummy cocktails and to definitely try breakfast at Tiffin room.

title: Iconic and well maintained property with excellent staff
desc: All tolled, we had a good stay apart from these items I have called out. The property is in good shape and the staff are excellent though there are still some opportunities to get a little more finesse in their dealing with unusual circumstances.

title: Top Notch Heritage Hotel in Singapore!
desc: Previously I was raving how good the service was at Hotel Kempinski at Capitol. After having my Wedding Anniversary celebrated over at Raffles Hotel for a 2 night staycation, it has made to my list of the best hotel in Singapore. Every detail was meticulously paid attention to which I will share in details below. Upon arrival, there was no need to check in at the counter. All we had to do was to relay our reservation to the staff at the counter (situated before the entrance) and we were swiftly ushered in for a photograph at the grand lobby. Before we know it, we were attended by Amir who showed us to our room at Palm Court Suite while giving a brief orientation of the hotel. However, one point for improvement would be for the staff to explain the privileges that the

title: Another level
desc: I wanted a memorable goodbye before leaving Singapore combined with the belated 40th birthday celebration and did Raffles Hotel deliver! Online check-in took all the formalities off the table and upon arrival I was taken straight to my suite. To my surprise I got upgraded to immense and gorgeous Grand Suite, on the 3rd floor of the main building, which has a huge terrace overlooking inner green yard. The room is completely soundproof and even if it’s Singapore downtown with much construction work, no noise gets in. After recent renovation the rooms and the whole property looks stunning and no expense was spared, everything is of the highest quality. Surprisingly there’s no ironing board in the room but it was promptly delivered upon request. Quirky items include the bath pillow,

title: Fabulous stay!
desc: So great to be back at this wonderful hotel. Every time we come here we are treated like family, and it’s great to chat with the team. Kudos to Grace and Nicholas for their friendliness - much appreciated! And of course, the accommodations were superb as was breakfast and the Writers Bar. Back soon hopefully!

title: Well-deserved Break
desc: This staycation was to celebrate a birthday, a well-deserved break. We loved everything about the hotel except that food could be better. Maybe we didn't order the right stuff. Every piece of furniture, generous amounts of USB ports in the room etc was so well-thought out. Will love to return.

title: Excellent Service!
desc: Super pleased with the Raffles Hotel service for our private Miu Miu event. Most importantly, Raffles exceeded the level of expectation we set for our VIC and they love the SPA which we had some VIC who asked for the name card which we believe they will be back again on their own. Special credit to Van who made everything so fuss-free from the beginning of the booking to site visit to the execution part. He's always reply to our request in less then 3 minutes and get every request done and we felt super well taken care of. Needless to say, Raffles Hotel service is truly AMAZING! All thanks to Van and his team! Regards, Zanne
